text_show:
Mu karere ka Nyanza mu murenge wa Busasamana mu kagari ka Gahondo mu mudugudu wa Bugura haravugwa urupfu rw’umushumba wasanzwe ku irembo ryaho yakoraga.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 21 Kamena 2022 ahagana saa moya umwana w’imyaka 17 y’amavuko yasohotse mu nzu iwabo agiye ku irembo abona umurambo yihutira kujya kubibwira se umubyara .
Yabwiye Se ko abonye muri rigori iri imbere y’iwabo haryamyemo uwitwa MUDAHINDAGARA Dusabe w’imyaka 22 y’amavuko yapfuye.
Uyu mushumba akomoka mu karere ka Nyanza mu Murenge wa Rwabicuma mu Kagari ka Runga mu Mudugudu wa Rugarama A.
Umwe mubageze aho umurambo wa nyakwigendera waruri yabwiye UMUSEKE ko nyakwigendera yarasanzwe ari Umushumba yari yaragiye iwabo (ku ivuko) ahamaze iminsi bukaba bwakeye basanga umurambo ku irembo ariko yari ataragaruka mu kazi.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Busasamana Bizimana Egide yabwiye UMUSEKE ko nyakwigendera yari amaze amezi umunani muri urwo rugo akora akazi ko kuragira inka akaba yarasabye uruhushya rwo kujya gusura iwabo bategereza ko agaruka baraheba.
Ati“RIB yatangiye Iperereza ngo hamenyekane icyamwishe.”
Umurambo wajyanwe ku bitaro bya Nyanza kugira ngo ukorerwe isuzuma
Théogène NSHIMIYIMANA / UMUSEKE.RW i Nyanza

Urukiko rushinzwe gukemura impaka muri Siporo ku Isi (TAS), rwatesheje agaciro ubujurire bw’Umutoza w’Umunya-Maroc, Adil Erradi Mohamed, wari wareze APR FC kumwirukana binyuranyije n’amategeko.
Adil watoje APR FC hagati ya Kanama 2019 n’Ukwakira 2022, yari yareze Ikipe y’Ingabo z’Igihugu muri FIFA, na yo itesha agaciro ikirego cye muri Gicurasi 2023.
Adil yavuye mu Rwanda mu ijoro ryo ku wa 24 Ukwakira 2022 ataye akazi ka APR FC yari yamuhagaritse kubera imyitwarire mibi yashinjwaga,agenda avuga ko bazakizwa n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi, FIFA, yaje gushyikiriza ikirego nyuma.
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe y’Ingabo, bwakomeje kugaragaza ko butifuza ko ibyabo n’uyu mutoza birangirira muri FIFA, ndetse bwateye intambwe buramuganiriza hagamijwe gushaka uburyo bakumvikana bakarangiza ikibazo mu nzira y’amahoro ariko uyu Munya-Maroc ayibera ibamba.
Adil Mohamed yabaye Umutoza wa APR FC mu mpeshyi ya 2019, ahava mu Ukwakira 2022 amaze kwegukana ibikombe bitatu bya Shampiyona birimo bibiri yatwaye adatsinzwe.
Source: UMURYANGO

Miss Akazuba Cynthia yasabwe anakobwa na Gakwaya Christian umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka
Cynthia Akazuba w’imyaka 29, wabaye ku nshuro ya mbere Nyampinga w’Umujyi wa Kigali mu 2007 ubwo yari afite imyaka 18 gusa, kuri ubu yamaze gusabwa no gukobwa na Gakwaya Christian umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka. Ni mu mihango yabereye Kimironko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 28 Nyakanga 2018.
Cynthia Akazuba ni umwe mu bahanga barangije mu ishami ry’ibijyanye n’ubwubatsi (Architecture-Creative Design) muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ishami rya Nyarugenge. Uyu mukobwa yambaye umwambaro w’abarangije kaminuza mu mwaka wa 2014.
Usibye kuba yarabaye Nyampinga w’Umujyi wa Kigali ariko kandi Akazuba Cynthia yanegukanye ikamba rya Miss East Africa 2009 nyuma yo guhiga abandi bakobwa bari kumwe mu marushanwa yabereye i Dar-Es-Salaam muri Tanzaniya, aho yanahembwe imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Toyota Celica.

Ni umwanzuro wafashwe n’Urukiko rushinzwe kurinda Itegeko Nshinga muri RDC, nyuma y’isuzuma ryakurikiye impagarara zashibutse mu matora y’abadepite n’ay’abasenateri yabaye ku wa 30 Ukuboza 2018.
Amashyaka menshi yagizweho ingaruka kuko nka Mouvement pour la libération du Congo (MLC) ya Jean-Pierre Bemba wabaye Visi Perezida wa RDC yatakaje imyanya umunani y’abadepite mu Nteko; “Ensemble pour le changement” ya Moïse Katumbi yamburwa imyanya ibiri y’abasenateri.
Umuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ritanga Ub
... (140 chars skipped) ... 
rezida wa Repubulika muri RDC yabaye mu Ukuboza 2018, Martin Fayulu wiyamamaje ku itike ya Lamuka yatsinzwe na Félix Tshisekedi nk’uko byemejwe na Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Amatora n’Urukiko rushinzwe kurinda Itegeko Nshinga muri icyo gihugu.
Fayulu ntiyemera ko yatsinzwe ndetse avuga ko muri RDC ubutegetsi [bwa Tshisekedi] buriho butemewe n’amategeko nubwo Kiliziya Gatolika n’imiryango mpuzamahanga byamwemeje nka Perezida wa RDC muri manda y’imyaka itanu.
Lamuka yongeye guhura n’akaga nyuma y’umwuka
... (140 chars skipped) ...
 abagize iri huriro.
Uyu muherwe w’imyaka 54 wagizwe umuhuzabikorwa wa Lamuka igizwe n’amwe mu mashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta yihuje ngo agarure impinduka muri RDC, yavuze ko intego ari ugukorana n’ubuyobozi bwa Tshisekedi no kugaragaza ibitagenda neza.
Umwe mu bavugizi ba Martin Fayulu, Steve Kivwata, yavuze ko ibyatangajwe na Katumbi binyuranyije n’amahame bashyizeho ndetse ko bidashoboka kuba Lamuka yakorana na Leta iriho yirengagije ibyabaye mu matora yashyizeho Tshisekedi.

Abanyarwanda baturiye umupaka uhuza imijyi ya Goma na Gisenyi, ubu bakorensha urupapuro rw’inzira rwa CEPGL mu kwambukiranya umupaka, urupapuro bishyura Amafaranga y’u Rwanda 1000, mu gihe mbere rwari rusanzwe rugura ibihumbi 10Frw.
Iyi ni inkuru nziza ku baturage ibihumbi bari basanzwe bakoresha irangamuntu, mu kwambukiranya imipaka ihuza Goma na Gisenyi, ubu bakaba bari barabujijwe kwambuka bitewe n’iki giciro kiri hejuru bamwe bavuga ko cyabagoraga.

 kitarimo umutekano ndetse hari abashobora kubahohotera. Birinde kujya mu bice bya kure, kandi bubahirize amasaha yo gutaha".
Urwandiko rwa CEPGL rwatumye abakoresha umupaka biyongera
Uru rwandiko rw’inzira rwatumye abakoresha umupaka uhuza umujyi wa Goma na Gisneyi biyongera, nubwo bagihura n’amananiza yo gufunga umupaka saa cyenda z’amanywa.
Nzabonimpa avuga ko umubare w’abakoresha imipaka yombi iri mu mujyi wa Gisenyi, bamaze kugera ku bihumbi 20 ku munsi, mu gihe muri 2018 bari ibihumbi 55, 
... (1142 chars skipped) ...
ka Rubavu, nyuma y’uko imirwano ikomeye ibera muri Teritwari ya Nyiragongo na Masisi ahasanzwe ahava ibiribwa, ariko bikaba bidashobora kugera mu mujyi wa Goma, kubera ingabo za Congo, FARDC, zahagaritse moto zikura ibiribwa mu bice biyoborwa na M23 muri Rutshuru, na ho ibituruka muri Masisi bibangamirwa n’intambara.
Byangabikunda guturana nakongo ningenzi cyane nuko harimwibibazo ariko turasaba Urwanda nakongo kwicarana bagahuza kuko ububanyenamahanga bwiza nibindibihugu nicyogishoro kubaturage

I Kigali abambari ba FPR na Ibuka batangiye iterabwoba ku muyobozi wa FDU-Inkingi, Madamu Victoire Ingabire, buririye ku jambo yavugiye ejo akigera mu Rwanda ku rwibutso rwa jenoside ku Gisozi. Muri iryo jambo rye, yavuze ko mu Rwanda habaye amahano yatumye hameneka amaraso menshi y’abanyarwanda. Avuga ko urwibutso nk’urwo rukwiriye kubaho, ariko yongeraho ko kugeza […]
Nkuko byari byamenyeshejwe abanyarwanda bose, ejo kuwa gatanu tariki ya 15 Mutarama 2010 niho Victoire Ingabire Umuhoza, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa FDU-Inkingi, yahagurukiye ku kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga cya Amsterdam-Schiphol yerekeza mu Rwanda aho agiye guhangana na Paul Kagame wa FPR mu matora ya Perezida wa Repubulika azaba muri uyu mwaka. Yaherekejwe n’umuryango we hamwe n’abarwanashyaka benshi […]

NBC yemeye ku mugaragaro ko umuherwe Elon Musk yaguze urubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter ku kayabo ka miliyari 44 z’amadorali.
Ibi byatangajwe ku ya 25 Mata 2022 ko Elon Musk yamaze kwegukana imigabane yose ya Twitter.
Uyu mugabo yasobanuye ko abona Twitter nk’urubuga rwo kuganiriraho ingingo z’ingenzi ku buzima bwa muntu.
Yavuze ko ashaka kugira Twitter urubuga nkoranyambaga rwiza, ruha abantu uburenganzira bwo kwisanzura bakavuga ibyo batekereza, akaruha imikorere mishya ku buryo rushobora kwizerwa kurushaho.
Igurwa rya Twitter ribaye mu gihe hari hashize igihe uru rubuga rwikomwa n’abantu b’ingeri zose ku buryo hari n’abanyapolitiki barunenga bavuga ko rubangamira ukwishyira ukizana kwabo mu gutanga ibitekerezo.
Umwaka ushize, Twitter yahagaritse konti y’uwahoze ari Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump.
Elon Musk yari asanzwe afite imigabane ingana na 9% muri Twitter. Mu ntangiriro za Mata nibwo yatangiye gutangaza ko afite gahunda zo kuba yagura uru rubuga.
Byitezwe ko mu mpera z’uyu mwaka aribwo igura n’igurisha rya Twitter rizaba ryarangiye.
Sorce:Yahoo.com

Muri Afurika hakomeje kuba amatora kenshi ariko abasesenguzi bavuga ko menshi muri yo aba akurikije amategeko ariko ntakorwe neza. Nubwo ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko benshi mu batuye Afurika bashaka kubaho muri demokarasi, hari umubare ugenda wiyongera w’abashakisha ibindi byayisimbura nk’ubutegetsi bw’igitugu nkuko mubisanga muri iyi nkuru y’umunyamakuru wa BBC, Dickens Olewe.
Abasesenguzi bavuga ko mu myaka itatu ishize, ibihugu byo muri Afurika muri rusange byasubiye inyuma mu rwego rw’amatege
... (2589 chars skipped) ... 
yobora igihugu ku nshuro ya gatanu muri 2021 yigeze kuvuga ati: “Nkunda Trump”.
Yanavuze kandi ko Trump ariwe perezida mwiza Amerika imaze kugira.
- Abanyafurika benshi baba biteguye gutora umurongo igihe kirerekire kugirango batore.
Muri 1991, Benin na Zambia byabaye ibihugu bya mbere byo muri Afurika byategekwaga n’ishyaka rimwe rukumbi byemeye demokarasi ihuriweho n’amashyaka menshi maze amatora atsindwa n’abatavuga rumwe na leta.
Ubwo haba hatangiye inkubiri ya demokarasi muri Afurika nyuma 
... (2589 chars skipped) ...
ora.
Steven Friedman, umwarimu wa politiki muri kaminuza ya Johannesburg, we avuga ko icyagombye kwitabwaho ari uguha abaturage ijambo mu bibazo byinshi bibareba aho kugereranya uko buri gihugu kiyobowe ugereranyije n’ibihugu byo mu Burayi na Amerika.
Inkuru nziza nuko demokarasi ikomeje gushyigikirwa.
Ariko aho ikibazo kiri ni uko idashobora kugerwaho mu gihe abanyafurika batemerewe kubaho mu mahoro no mu bwisanzure kandi ntibitabire amatora akozwe mu mucyo nta buriganya.

Uyu mugabo wiberaga muri Hong Kong akekwaho kugira uruhare mu gufasha u Bushinwa gushwanyuza umugambi w’ubutasi bwa Amerika muri icyo gihugu ndetse n’abayihaga amakuru baratahurwa barafatwa, ku buryo guhera mu 2010 bibarwa ko hishwe abari hagati ya 18 na 20. Ukunanizwa kwa CIA mu Bushinwa gufatwa nka kimwe mu bibazo bikomeye ubutasi bwa Amerika bwagize mu myaka ishize.
coque huawei pas cher Gusa urujijo rwagiye rukomeza kuba uburyo amazina y’abo bantu yamenyekanaga ndetse n’amakuru babonye akagw
... (379 chars skipped) ... 
njiye mu itumanaho ku buryo yumviriza ubutumwa buhanahanwa n’abakozi bari mu mahanga.
Coque iPhone 6S Jerry Chun Shing Lee uzwi nka Zhen Cheng Li yakoreye CIA hagati y’umwaka wa 1994 na 2007, aza kuvamo yigira muri Hong Kong. Yafatiwe ku kibuga mpuzamahanga cy’indege cyitiriwe John F.
coque iphone occasion Kennedy i New York, kuwa Mbere w’iki cyumweru, ashinjwa gutunga amakuru y’ubutasi binyuranyije n’amategeko. Yaherukaga muri Amerika mu 2012 ubwo yari asubiye kubana n’umuryango we muri Virgini
... (379 chars skipped) ...
i CIA na batasi bakoranaga nayo, amazina yabo nyakuri ndetse na nimero za telefoni nk’uko inyandiko z’urukiko zibigaragaza.
Coque iphone Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko ayo makuru agenda ahura n’ayo Lee yandikaga ubwo yari akiri muri CIA. Inyandiko zitandukanye zinagaragaza ko Lee yakoze mu gisirikare cya Amerika guhera mu 1982 kugeza 1986, akaza kwinjira muri CIA mu 1994. New York Times ivuga ko igihe Lee yavaga muri CIA mu 2007 yari yatewe n’uburakari bw’uko akazi ke kari kageze igihe cyo guhagarara.

Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru kur’uyu wa mbere igenekerezo rya 15 Nzero 2018,ayo mashirahamwe avuga ko vyose bikozwe hakwirikijwe amategeko, ata ngorane irimwo.
Venant Hamza BURIKUKIYE aserukira CAPES + yamenyesheje ko ata kintu kizoza gisubiza inyuma ishaka ry’abarundi bipfuza amahoro,urukundo hamwe no kuryohererwa kuba ari abarundi, ari naco gituma ivyasabwe n’abarundi bitegerezwa gukorwa.

bishigikira kuko arivyo abarundi bazoba bipfuje biciye mu matora.
Venat Hamza BURIKUKIYE yavuze ati : ’’Nta wuzi akari ku mutima k’uwundi naho bazotora Oya tuzobishigikira kuko arivyo abanyagihugu bazoba batoye.’’
Ku vyerekeye igikorwa catangujwe n’amashirahamwe asaba ko ico gikorwa cohagarara, Maitre Jean Marie NDUWIMANA aserukira PISC BURUNDI yavuze ati’’ :Ivyo ayo mashirahamwe asaba canke akora afashanije n’ibihugu vyo hanze ntaco bizoshikako ,ivyo bavuga vyose birabaraba.’’

Michael Lulu agiye gushinga Urwiwe
Inkuru nziza mu muryango kwaba Michael Lulu, s’ifungurwa ryiwe gusa, hiyongereyemwo n’ivy’ubukwe bwiwe.
Uwo mukinyi w’amareresi muri Tanzania akaba agiye Ku rushinga n’umusore azwi cane nka Majey. Uyo akaba azwiho gutanguza imboneshakuru n’insamirizi bikomeye mu ntara ya Dodoma nkuko amakuru dukesha ibinyamakuru muri Tanzania abishikiriza.
Lulu akaba azokora ubukwe inyuma yaho arekuriwe muri uku kwezi kwa 5, akaba yaramaze amezi 7 mu gasho, yaragisigaje umwaka n’amezi 5 ngo arangize igifungo yari yakatiwe n’ubutungane.
Mwokwibuka ko umuvyeyi wa Lulu yari yamusavye gushunga urwiwe kuvyara n’ukuzoza araja gukorera imva ya Kanumba ngo bikunde umuzimu w’umuhungu wiwe ntumukurikirane

Perezida w’u Rwanda Paul Kagame kuri uyu wa kane tariki ya 19/12/2013 yageze I Dakar muri Senegal, mu ruzindiko rwa mbere agiriye mugenzi we Macky Sall kuva yaba perezida wa Senegal muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize.
Mu kiganiro abaperezida bombi bahaye abanyamakuru, perezida Kagame yavuzeko u Rwanda rufiter ubushake bwo gukomeza umubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Perezida Kagame yavuzeko yaboneyeho gutumira mugenzi we Macky Sall ngo nawe azaze gusura u Rwanda.
Ibiro bya Perezida Kagame bitangaza ko u Rwanda na Senegal bimaze imyaka 3 biteza imbere imibanire y’ibihugu byombi binyuze muri dipolomasi (diplomatic mission).
Mu mezi ari imbere, biteganyijwe ko ba Minisitiri b’Ububanyi n’Amahanga b’ibihugu byombi bazashyira umukono ku masezerano atandukanye y’imibanire myiza ndetse no mu mwaka utaha Senegal ikazaha Abanyarwanda 15 buruse zo kujya gukomeza amasomo yabo ya kaminuza y’iby’ubuvuzi bw’amatungo (veterinary studies) ku ishuri ryitwa Regional Institute of Higher Learning of Senegal.

Abaririmvyi bagize umugwi We Love Muzika Rappy Boy na mukuruwe Trey zo baragarutse nikindi gikwogwa ginshasha bigaragara neza ko izoba Ariyo guheza umwaka.
Inyuma yo gusohora indirimbo Yooh indirimbo yakunzwe cane gushika naho baciye bayi korera remix ariyo Yooh remix aho yabashikanye kuyindi ntambwe, abo basore babiri bavukana Trey Zo na Rappy Boy baragarutse kandi n’iyindi ndirimbo biriko giragaragara ko abantu bayirindiranye igishika cishi, iyo ndirimbo ikazoba ifise amasanumu bise « SOBA ».
Kumakuru dukesha imbugazabo nuko iyo indirimbo igiye kuja ahabona k’umusi wa kane igenekerezo rya 15 Kigarama 2022 nayo amasanuma yashoboye gukorwa n’umuhinyanyuzi John Elarts amajwi nayo akorwa n’umuhinyanyuzi Kolly Da Magic. Tukwubutse ko bari bamaze igihe baboneka mu ndirimbo z’abandi baririnvyi badasohora iyi wabo, nk’indirimbo baheruka gukorana n’uwusanzwe avanga vanga imiziki ariwe bita DJ Lewis indirimbo imaze indwi zibiri isohotes.

Umwami wa UEFA Champions League,Cristiano Ronaldo yatangaje ko nubwo atatsinze ibitego byinshi mu matsinda, irushanwa rya UEFA Champions League rigeze aharyoshye ndetse yiteguye gufasha Juventus gukora mu jisho ikipe iyo ariyo yose bazahurira muri 1/16 cy’irangiza.
Nyuma yo gutsindwa na Young Boys mu mujyi wa Bern ibitego 2-1,Ronaldo yabwiye abanyamakuru ko igice kiryoshye cya UEFA Champions league kigeze ariyo mpamvu biteguye kurindimura ikipe yose bazatombora muri 1/16 cy’irangiza muri tombola izaba ku wa mbere mu mujyi wa Nyon mu Busuwisi.
Ronaldo amaze gutwara UEFA Champions League 5
Yagize ati “Igice cyiza cya UEFA Champions League kirageze ndetse nizeye ko twiteguye neza kwitwara neza.Ndatuje cyane kuko nzi imbaraga z’iyi kipe ndetse n’izanjye.Nakagombye kuba naratsinze ibitego byinshi ariko uyu ni umupira w’amaguru.Ubu tugiye kwitegura umukino uzakurikiraho.”
Ronaldo yagiye yigaragaza cyane mu mikino yo gukuranamo mu marushanwa 3 aheruka ya UEFA Champions League,bituma afasha Real Madrid kwegukana ibikombe 3 byikurikiranya.
Cristiano Ronaldo amaze gutwara ibikombe bya UEFA Champions League 5 ndetse abigizemo uruhare runini bituma benshi bemeza ko ariwe mwami wa UEFA Champions League.
Juventus ishobora gutumbora imwe mu makipe yabaye aya kabiri mu matsinda arimo Schalke, Atletico Madrid, Tottenham, Liverpool, Ajax na Lyon.

BMBC ni ishirahamwe ry’abarundi rikorera mu gisata co gutegura imigero y’amazu no kuyubaka, ryashinzwe mu 2012 mu ntumbero yo kworohereza abarundi bifuza kwubaka baba bari mu mahanga canke mu Burundi, rikaba rimaze gukorana n’ibisata vya leta hamwe n’abikorera utwabo batandukanye.
Turacapura amazu atandukanye manini na matoya, turakora ivyirwa bijanye n’ubukomezi bw’amazu(etudes de la structure) tutibagiye no guharura ibikoresho hamwe n’amafaranga yose inzu izotwara gushika iheze neza.

Amakuru ya Niyigena Clement myugariro wa APR FC yatumye amakipe yongera kumutekerezaho
Myugariro w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda Amavubi ndetse n'ikipe ya APR FC, Niyigena Clement agiye kongera kugaruka mu myitozo nyuma yo kuva kuvuzwa muri Kenya.
Mu cyumweru gishize nibwo ikipe ya APR FC yohereje Niyigena Clement mu gihugu cya Kenya kujya kuvurizwayo, nyuma y'igihe kinini afite uburwayi bwari bwateye ubwoba abakunzi ba APR FC.
Nyuma yo kugera muri Kenya abaganga baramuvuye ndetse bahita bamwemerera gutangira imyitozo kuko ngo ikibazo afite ntabwo giteye ubwoba kizagenda kirangira gake gake uko azajya akina imikino imwe n'imwe.
Abacyeba b'ikipe ya APR FC bumvaga bakize ubuhanga bw'uyu musore ariko ubu bagiye kongera gutekereza uko bazajya bamucaho kugirango babone ibitego. Niyigena Clement kugeza ubu ari hano mu Rwanda vuba aratangira imyitozo n'abandi bakinnyi ba APR FC.

Prezida wa Mali, Bah N'Daw n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Moktar Ouane baracapfunzwe n'abasirikare bagumutse. Bajanywe ku nguvu ku cicaro c’igisirikare amasaha makeya inyuma y'uko abanywanyi 2 mu basirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri coup d’etat yabaye haraheze amazi 9 badashizwe muri reta nshasha mfatakibanza.
Umuryango w’ubumwe bwa Afrika, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU, n’ishirahamwe ry’ugufashanya mu vy’ubutunzi ry’ibihugu vyo muri Afrika yo mu burengero, CEDEAO hamwe n’amakungu vyasavye ko Prezida Bah N’Daw n’umushikiranganji wa mbere, Moctar Ouane bajanywe hamwe n’abandi ku cicaro c’ikambi y’igisirikare ya Kati mw’ijoro ryo ku musi wa mbere barekurwa bidatevye.
Iyo kambi iri ku bilometero 15 umuntu avuye ku murwa mukuru wa Mali, Bamako, kandi ni yo kambi yahoze icumbitswemwo n’abagize coup d’etat. Amakungu ariyamiriza ikoreshwa iryariryo ryose ry’inguvu, n’ugutuma abategetsi batanga imihoho ku nguvu.
Amenyesha ko ingingo itiyumviwe yafashwe y’ugupfunga umukuru w’igihugu n’umushikiranganji wa mbere ishobora kuzogeramira ivyerekeye gufasha Mali. Vyitezwe ko abaserukira ishirahamwe CEDEAO bagendera umurwa mukuru, Bamako uno musi ku wa kabiri.
Nta tangazo igisirikare kirasohora ku vyerekeye ingingo cafashe. Ingingo cafashe irateye amakenga mashasha ku vyuko niba reta mfatakibanza izoshobora kubandanya mu mwidegemvyo, igashobora kugirisha amatora mashasha arangwa na demokrasi mu kwezi kwa kabiri kw’umwaka uza mu gihugu.
Facebook Forum

Uburundi bwaraye butahukanye imidari itari mike mu nkino z’igikombe ca Judo co ku mugabane wa Afrika (Championnat de la Coupe d’Afrique de Judo Cadet et Junior) aho catahukanye imidari 13 y’inzahabu,14 y’ifeza hamwe n’imidari 13 y’umujumbu ariko bunanirwa no gutwara umudari w’inzahabu m’urwaruka rutarenza ibiro 60.
Muri izo nkino zatunganirijwe mu Burundi umusore ALLAMINE Abdel Aziz wo mu gihugu Tchad hamwe na FATIME BARKA Segue w’umwigeme ava mu gihugu ca Tchad atarenza ibiro 52, yaciye muryahumye abaserukiye ibindi bihugu harimwo Uburundi bitwara iyo midari mugihe uwitwa YOUSSOUF Hussein Ramadan wo muri Tchad yigenjeje neza mu miyabaga itarenza ibiro 66.
Mu kibanza ca 2 hibonekeje igihugu ca Tchad aho catwaye imidare 2 y’inzahabu hamwe n’umudare umwe w’ifeza mu gihe igihugu ca Kenya caje ubwanyuma giheza ata mudare numwe gitahukiye.
Muri izo nkino vyigaragaje ko igihugu c’Uburundi citavye izo nkino ku mice nka yose mu gihe zitabwe n’ibihugu vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika nka Tchad,Kenya,Urwanda,Repuburika iharanira intwaro rusangi ya Kongo,Senegal hamwe n’igihugu ca Maroc.
Bitumwe n’uko Uburundi bwatunganije neza inkino nk’izo mu mwaka uheze w’2018 bwaciye buhabwa ayandi mahirwe yo kwongera gutegura iryo higanwa uyu mwaka w’2019.

Uruzinduko rw’Umukuru w’Igihugu ruje rukurikira urwo aherutse kugirira muri icyo gihugu tariki 14 Gashyantare 2022, aho na bwo yaragiranye ibiganiro na Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad.
Perezida Kagame ku Kibuga cy’Indege Mpuzamahanga cyitiriwe Hamad, yakiriwe n’Umuyobozi w’Ishami rishinzwe kwakira abantu(Protocol) muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Ibrahim bin Yousif Fakhro, na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Qatar, Igor Marara.
Qatar n’u Rwanda, bisanganywe umubano mwiza aho ugaragarira mu bikorwa binyuranye. Urugero ni nk’aho Qatar yashoye imari mu iyubakwa ry’ikibuga cy’indege cya Bugesera, ikaba ifitemo imigabane 60% naho Leta y’u Rwanda ikagiramo 40%.
Ibihugu byombi kandi mu 2022 byashyize umukono ku masezerano y’ubufatanye mu bya gisirikare n’umutekano, nyuma y’uruzinduko rw’umugaba mukuru w’ingabo za Qatar, Lt. Gen. Salem Bin Hamad Al Aqeel Al Nabit yagiriye mu Rwanda.

Igenekerezo rya 24 Rusama.

1626 : Peter Minuit agura izinga rya Manhattan. Izinga riri mu gisagara ca New York muri Reta Zunzubumwe z’Amerika.
1993 : Igihugu ca Erythreya kirikukira.
Abazwi cane bavutse kw’igenekerezo nkiri
1945 : Priscilla Beaulieu, umukinyi w’amareresi akaba n’umutambukanyi wa Elvis Presley.
1966 : Eric Cantona, umukinyi w’umupira w’amaguru w’umufaransa.
1976 : Mokobé, umwe mubagize umurwi w’abaririmvyi 113 hamwe na Mafia K’1 Fry.
1979 : Tracy McGrady, umukinyi wa basketball w’umunyamerika.
Abazwi cane bitavyimana kw’igenekerezo nkiri
1883 : Abd El-Kader, uwarongoye igihugu ca Algérie.
1903 : Marcel Renault, umufaransa yatanguje imiduga yo mu bwoba bwa Renault.

Bulgarie : Umunsi wahariwe indero, imico, ukwandika.
Bermudes : Umunsi wahariwe igihugu.
Erythreya : Umunsi mukuru wo kwibuka ukwikukira.

Mu migambwe y’abatavuga rumwe na Leta y’Uburundi, ikibazo co kwitegurira amatora ya 2020 kiriko cigwako cane. Ku makuru amaze kuja ahabona, biravugwa cane ko abatavuga rumwe na Leta bashobora kuja hamwe maze bagatanga umukandida umwe abaserukira mu matora ya 2020. Uwuhabwa amahirwe cane akaba ari umushingamateka Rwasa Agathon.
Ariko rero, nk’uko isoko ry’iyi nkuru ribishira ahabona, biragaragara cane ko uguhuriza ku gutanga umukandida umwe bikirimwo inzitizi zinaka. Agathon Rwasa n’urunani rwiwe
... (494 chars skipped) ... 
intamabamyi zirahari. Abatavuga rumwe na leta bari mu gihugu( Opposition interne) bakaba bavuga cane ibijanye no gutanaga umukandida umwe mu matora ya 2020. Bakaba bamenyesh

FDD(Frondeurs) n’abo muri MSD basanzwe bari hanze y’igihugu.

Mu gihe kandi abatavuga rumwe na Leta bahurikiye mu runani CNARED bokwumvikana n’abatavuga rumwe na leta bari mu Burundi mu gutanga umukandida umwe mu matora ya 2020, biragarara cane ko CNDD-FDD ishobora kudatsinda ayo matora ya 2020.

Ikigo cy’Igihugu Gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC) cyatangaje ko guhera ku wa mbere tariki 23 Kanama 2021, mu Mujyi wa Kigali hazatangira gahunda yo gukingira abantu bafite guhera ku myaka 18.
Mu bu tumwa bwatanzwe na RBC kuri Twitter, yagize iti
COVID19 imaze kudutwara abantu benshi ariko Leta yazaniye abaturarwanda inkingo kugirango basubire mu buzima busanzwe. Guhera ku wa mbere tariki 23.08.2021, i Kigali hazatangira gahunda yo gukingira abantu bafite guhera ku myaka 18.
RBC On Twitter
Urubyiruko rurashishikarizwa kwitabira kwikingiza kuko ari amahirwe yo kwirinda icyorezo no gutuma igihugu gishobora gusubira mu buzima busanzwe.
U Rwanda mu minsi ishize ruherutse kwakira inkingo za Covid-19 ibyiciro bibiri. Zimwe zatanzwe na Leta zunze Ubumwe za America izindi zitangwa n’ Ubishinwa.

Ibyamamare mu mupira w’amaguru birimo Cristiano Ronaldo,Bruno Fernandes bakinira Manchester United n’imiryango yabo, Robert Lewandowski wa Bayern Munich, Luis Suárez ukinira Atlético Madrid n’abakinnyi ba Liverpool bashyize hanze amafoto bambaye imyenda yihariye bifuriza abantu noheli.
Uwahoze ari kapiteni wa Arsenal, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, yashyize hanze ifoto ari kumwe n’umuryango we yandikaho ati “Noheli Nziza Umuryango mbere ya byose!”
Diogo Jota wa Liverpool yasangije abamukurikira ifoto ari kumwe n’umugore we n’umwana wabo ukiri muto.
David Beckham wasezeye gukina ruhago yigaragaje yambaye ingofero ya Santa ubwo yanywaga ikawa mu gitondo.
Rutahizamu wa Wolves, Raul Jimenez, yashyize hanze ifoto ari kumwe n’umugore we Daniela n’umwana wabo Arya nyuma y’iminsi agize imvune yatumye adasoza umwaka w’imikino wa 2020/21.
Iyi minsi mikuru isoza umwaka irangwa n’ibiruhuko muri za Shampiyona zikomeye i Burayi uretse mu Bwongereza aho bakina kuri Boxing Day.

Nkuko ikinyamakuru Gazzetta dello Sport kibitangaza , ikipe ya PSG yo mu Bufaransa kuri ubu irifuza kugura umukinnyi Cristiano Ronaldo imukuye muri Real Madrid hamwe n’umutoza wayo Jose Mourinho.
Ibi ikipe ya PSG ikaba ishaka kubikora itanze akayabo ka miliyoni 100 z’ama Euro ngo ice agahingo ko gukomeza kwibikaho ibihangange muri ruhago.
Kuruhande rwa Real Madrid nabo bakaba kuri ubu babona ko ikipe ya PSG ishobora kubarusha agafaranga kava muri petoroli kuri ubu bakaba batangiye kwifuza Radamel Falcao mu gihe Ronaldo yaba agiye nkuko azzetta dello Sport ikomeza ibitangaza.
Biteganyijwe ko Ronaldo aramutse aje muri PSG yajya ahembwa miliyoni 18 z’ama euro mu gihe Zlatan Ibrahimovic we ahembwa miliyoni 14.5!

Impunzi zirenga ibihumbi 24.600 z’Abarundi zaratahukanywe zivuye mu bihugu vya Kongo, Tanzaniya, u Rwanda, Ubuganda n’ahandi mu mezi atatu aheze. Ibi vyashikirijwe n’umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, Gervais Ndirakobuca. N’aho biri uko, bamwe mu bahungutse biganiye Ijwi rya Amerika ko batararonka imfashanyo yihuta y’amazu n’ivyo gufungura. Umushikiranganji yagize n’ico avuga ku kibazo c’umutekano muke umaze iminsi urangwa mu gihugu.
Mu kiganiro umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu yahaye abamenyeshamakuru i Bujumbura ku murwa mukuru w’ubutunzi, yemeje ko igikorwa co gutahukana impunzi kiriko kigenda neza.
Ibindi kuri iyi nkuru muvyumve mu majwi y'umumenyeshamakuru w'Ijwi ry'Amerika i Kigali mu Rwanda, Pierre Claver Niyonkuru

Agafashanyo ku banyeshure batoye ikibazo ca Reta gasa n’akariko karavanwaho. Ingingo zishasha zigiye gufatwa, guhera muri uno mwaka w’ishure 2013 ushira uw’ 2014, ku vyerekeye agafashanyo kahora gahabwa abanyeshure biga muri za kaminuza, yaba kubari hano mu gihugu hamwe n’abiga mu mahanga.
Ubushikiranganji bw’inyigish
... (504 chars skipped) ... 
, abagera ku 4495 batoye ikibazo ca Reta bafise amanota angana canke asumba 69,2 nibo bazoronka ka gafashanyo kahora gatangwa na Reta. Abandi 2032 batoye ikibazo ca Reta baronse amanota ari hagati ya 69,1 kw’ijana hamwe na 66,5 kw’ijana bazoba bafise uburenganzira bwo kwiga muri kaminuza za Reta yaba muri kaminuza y’Uburundi canke mw’ishure nderabigisha ENS (Ecole normale superieure) ariko ata gafashanyo na kamwe baronka.

Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Uganda FUFA, ryamaze gutangaza ko ryirukanye bururndu umutoza w’ikipe y’iki Gihugu Jonathan Mckinstry nyuma y’ukwezi ahagaritswe by’agateganyo kuri uyu mwanya.
Jonathan Mckinstry umutoza ukiri muto mu bunararibonye kuko Uganda ari ikipe y’Igihugu ya kabiri yari atoje nyuma yo guhera ku Rwanda hagati y’umwaka wa 2016 na 2017.
Ikinyamakuru cyandika imikino muri Uganda Kawowo cyemeza ko umwe mu bayobozi ba FUFA yagitangarije ko umutoza Mckinstry yamaze kwirukanwa ko igisigaye ari ukubitangaza gusa. Jonathan Mckinstry yari afite amasezerano y’imyaka 3 yo gutoza iyi kipe uhereye muri Nzeri 2019.
Gusa ntazibukwa na benshi kuko yasanze iyi kipe imaze kumenyera kujya mu gikombe cy’Afurika ariko ku ngoma ye iyi kipe yarabinaniwe kuko yatsinzwe na Sudan y’epfo na Malawi bituma itageza amanota yasabwaga ngo yitabire imikino y’igikombe cy’Afurika cya 2021 akaba ri nayo ntandaro yo kwirukanwa kwe.
Nubwo umusaruro we utashimwe na benshi biravugwa ko azahabwa arenga miliyoni 200 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda nk’imperekeza kuko amasezerano ye asheshwe atarangiye nyuma yuko yahembwaga akabakaba miliyoni 15 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda buri kwezi.
Mckinstry yatoje ikipe y’Igihugu ya Uganda imikino 17 atsindamo 11 anganya 3 atsindwa itatu, yatsinze ibitego 27 muri iyi mikino mu gihe we yatsinzwe ibitego 12.

Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Rwanda yitegura umukino wa mbere wo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’Isi cya 2026, yamanutse mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo ahazabera uyu mukino, yizeza ko imikino yose bazakinira mu Rwanda, bagomba kuyitwaramo neza.
Aba bakinnyi bamaze iminsi bari mu mwiherero mu Mujyi wa Kigali, berecyeje mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 13 Ugushyingo 2023.
Berekeje mu Karere ka Gisagara aho bazaba bacumbitse, bakazajya banakorera imyitozo kuri Sitade ya Huye izanakirwaho uyu mukino uzahuza u Rwanda na Zimbabwe kuri uyu wa Gatatu.
Abakinnyi bose bari bamaze iminsi bari mu mwiherero bamanutse, mu gihe bagitegereje Byiringiro Lague ukina muri Sandvikens IF yo muri Sweden, ndetse na Mutsinzi Ange ukina muri Norway, na Imanishimwe Emmanuel bose bakaba bagera mu Rwanda kuri uyu wa Mbere.
U Rwanda rufitanye umukino na Zimbabwe kuri uyu wa Gatatu kuri Sitade mpuzamahanga ya Huye, rukazongera kwakira Afurika y’Epfo tariki 21 Ugushyingo 2023 i Huye.
Mu kiganiro ikipe y’Igihugu iherutse kugirana n’itangazamakuru, Rwatubyabye Abdul yizeje Abanyarwanda ko bazitwara neza, ku buryo imikino bazakirira mu Rwanda yose, bizeye kuzayitwara.

Mu mikino y’umunsi wa Kabiri wa shampiyona ya Basketball y’abakinnyi bafite Ubumuga, Wheelchair Basketball, ikipe ya Eagles yitwaye neza mu byiciro byombi.
Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 12 Ugushyingo 2023, ni bwo shampiyona ya Basketball y’Abafite Ubumuga, Wheelchair Basketball, yakomeje hakinwa imikino y’umunsi wa Kabiri.
Ni imikino yahereye ku bibuga byo mu Karere ka Gasabo biherereye ku Kimironko biherutse gufungurwa ku mugaragaro n’Umukuru w’Igihugu, Paul Kagame.
Mu bagabo, imikino itatu Kicukiro yakinnye, yatsinzemo ibiri, itsindwa umwe. Yatsinze Bugesera 35-12, itsinda Gicumbi 28-14, itsindwa na Eagles 30-19.
Ikipe ya Eagles yatsinze Bugesera 20-08, inatsinda Gicumbi 28-04. Bisobanuye ko ikipe ya Eagles yatsinze imikino ya yo yose itatu mu cyiciro cy’Abagabo.
Indi mikino yabaye mu bagabo, Musanze yatsinze Indangamirwa 19-04, inatsinda Gasabo 20-10. Indangamirwa yatsinze Gasabo 16-12, mu gihe Bugesera yatsinze Gicumbi 17-09.
Mu cyiciro cy’Abagore, Kicukiro yatsinze Gasabo 12-08, inatsinda Move Dream 16-02. Gasabo yo yatsinze Move Dream 18-00.
Imikino y’umunsi wa Gatatu wa Wheelchair Basketball, izakinwa tariki ya 3 Ukuboza 2023.

Perezida wa Aljeriya Abdelaziz Bouteflika ku musi wa mbere yaremeye ko azoguma ku butegetsi naho manda yiwe izorangira mu kwezi kuza, ivyo abivuze mu gihe abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi babandanya imyiyerekano yiyamiriza ubutegetsi bwiwe.
Bouteflika yatangaje kw’italiki 11 z’ukwezi kwa gatatu ko ahevye kwitoreza ikiringo ca gatanu, aho abakora imyiyerekano babona ivyatumye bihereza amabarabara giheze.
Bouteflika w’imyaka 82 yarakuyeho amatora yari ategekanijwe kw’italiki 18 z’ukwezi kwa kane yongera avuga ko hari ivyo agiye guhindura abicishije mu biganiro azotunganya mu gihugu.
Naho yemeza ko hari ivyo agiye kuzohindura mw'ibwirizwa shingiro, abanyaljeriya barabandanya imyiyerekano ku bwinshi kandi mu mahoro.

Kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 05 Mata 2024, Umuvugizi wa M23 mu bya politike, Lawrence Kanyuka yibukije amahanga ko kutubahiriza amasezerano kwayo biri mu byatumye Genocide mu Rwanda iba ko kandi no muri Congo iri gukorwa.
Yabitangarije mu butumwa yashize hanze butangira buvuga ko genocide ‘itazongera kubaho ukundi’, avuga ko ibi bitari amagambo gusa ahubwo ko byari isezerano ryatanzwe nyuma ya genocide yakorewe Abayahudi ndetse na nyuma ya Genocide yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Ubutumwa bwa 
... (421 chars skipped) ... 
nga n’ubu wacecetse mu gihe cya genocide yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse n’ubu ukaba ugikomeje guceceka kandi FDLR (Abakoze genocide y’Abatutsi mu Rwanda) n’ihuriro ry’Ingabo za FARDC, Wazalendo, ingabo z’u Burundi na SADC, bari gukora Genocide no kuyigisha mu batuye mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika ya demokarasi ya Congo.
Ubu tumwa bwa Lawrence Kanyuka bukomeza buvuga ko bagikomeje kwibutsa amahanga ko abakoze genocide y’Abatutsi mu Rwanda bifatanije n’ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Tshisekedi mu kwica abasivi
... (421 chars skipped) ...
kwica, gufata abagore ku ngufu no gukora n’andi mabi ashingiye ku kwigisha urwango ku Banye-Congo bavuga ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda.
Yagize ati: “Guceceka kw’amahanga ntiguhishira abakoze genocide gusa, kuko binatesha agaciro imbaraga zo kwimakaza amahoro, umutekano n’ubwiyunge mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari.”
“Umuryango mpuzamahanga ukwiye gufata ingamba zihamye bagafatira ibihano Tshisekedi na FDLR, ndetse na MONUSCO kubera ko ishyigikira ihuriro ry’Ingabo z’ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Félix Tshisekedi.”

Uwahoze ari umutoza wa FC Barcelona, Quique Setien yashwanye na kapiteni w’kipe Leo Messi kugeza ubwo amubwira ko niba adashaka kumwumvira azi aho umuryango umusohora mu ikipe uri.
Ibinyamakuru bitandukanye I Burayi byatangaje ko aba bagabo bombi batandukanye ariko batumvikana kuko ngo bigeze guterana amagambo bikomeye.
Nyuma yo kunganya na Celta Vigo ibitego 2-2 muri shampiyona ishize,aba bagabo bombi bateranye amagambo bigera ubwo Setien abwira Messi ko azi aho umuryango uva mu ikipe uri abish

ague batsinzwe ibitego 8-2,Messi yararakaye cyane niko guhita asaba FC Barcelona ko yamurekura ku buntu akigendera gusa Perezida Bartomeu yarabyanze.

Umutoza Setien wamaze amezi 6 atoza FC Barcelona akayivamo yirukanwe mu buryo butamushimishije,yatangaje ko gutoza Messi bigoye kubera ko ibigwi yakoze muri iyi kipe bituma nta
... (633 chars skipped) ...
na ibintu nkuko abishaka.Ntabwo avuga cyane.”
Umutoza Quique Setien w’imyaka 62 yirukanwe muri FC Barcelona muri Kanama uyu mwaka nyuma yo gusezererwa nabi muri UEFA Champions League anyagiwe na Bayern Munich ibitego 8-2.Yatoje imikino 25 gusa.

Inyuma yo gushira ahabona video y’ururirimbo"Overdose", imbere y’abamenyeshamakuru, G-Bo yarabajijwe ivyo ategekanya gukora muri kazoza kiretse iyo video yokorewe na Di Moda Fashions.
Uwo muririmvyi yaratangaje abari aho mu kwemeza ko ata minsi isigaye kugira ashire ahabona urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere rugizwe n’indirimbo 15.
Urukurikirane rugiye gusohoka rwitwa "4G", rukaba rugiye kuja ahabona kw’igenekerezo ry’icumi na kane Kigarama (14/12/2017) ; rugizwe n’indirimbo zikurikira : My Future, Ntawundi nshaka, Ntelefona, Komplike, Mama Bado, stamina, Wama Umbabaza, Zainabo, Mjomba, Mama kabibi, sioni,Pam Pam Shida, Mimi nawe hamwe na Watazoweya.
Big Fizzo, Mr Champagne na Rossignol bazomufasha guteramisha abantu. Uwo wanyuma asanzwe avuka mu gihugu ca Republika Iharanira Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo amenyesha ko umuziki w’ibihugu vyo mu karere k’ibiyaga binini wazingamitswe n’indyane za politique.
Ivyo yavyishuye inyuma igihe G-Bo yashira ahabona video y’ururirimbo "Overdose".

Visi Perezida wa Kabiri ushinzwe Amarushanwa mu Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda ry'Umukino wa Volleyball (FRVB), Bagirishya Jean de Dieu uzwi nka 'Jado Castar', azagezwa imbere y'Urukiko Rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo ku wa Gatanu tariki 8 Ukwakira 2021.
Uyu mugabo ufite ubunararibonye mu mukino wa Volleyball, agiye gutangira kwiregura ku byaha akurikiranyweho birimo gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano.
Jado Castar yatawe muri yombi tariki ya 20 Nzeri 2021 aho akurikiranyweho gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano mu gushyira mu bikorwa inshingano ze.
Ibi byaha byaje nyuma y'aho ikipe y'Igihugu y'u Rwanda y'Abagore yasezerewe mu Gikombe cya Afurika cya Volleyball cyabereye i Kigali hagati ya tariki ya 10 n'iya 20 Nzeri 2021, ishinjwa gukinisha abakinnyi bakomoka muri Brazil batujuje ibisabwa.
abo bakinnyi barimo Aline Siqueira, Apolinario Caroline Taiana, Mariana Da Silva na Moreira Bianca Gomes bakomoka muri Brazil, bakiniye u Rwanda ku nshuro ya mbere nyuma yo kugera i Kigali muri Kanama uyu mwaka,ariko ibyangombwa byabo byabaye ikibazo bituma u Rwanda rusezererwa mu gikombe cya Afurika.

Hari aho itegeko nshinga rihindurwa n’imbunda, nko muri Mali mu kwezi gushize. Hari n’aho rihinduka binyuze mu nzira ya demokrasi.
Guhindagura itegeko nshinga mu bihugu by’Afurika yo mu nsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara bisa n'ibyabaye umuderi mu bategetsi bamwe. Hari aho itegeko nshinga rihindurwa n’imbunda, nkuko byagenze muri Mali mu kwezi gushize. Hari n’aho rihinduka binyuze mu nzira ya demokrasi.
Mu kiganiro "
Tujye Impaka", umunyamakuru w’Ijwi ry’Amerika Etienne Karekezi araganira n’impuguke eshatu, zirimo porofeseri Jean Leonard Buhigiro wigisha mw’ishuri rikuru nderabarezi rya Kigali, bwana Frank Mwine, impuguke mu by’amategeko mpuzamahanga na politiki ndetse na porofeseri Jean Marie Vianey Higiro wigisha muri kaminuza Western New England College muri leta ya Massachussetts.
Umunyamakuru Karekezi aratangira abaza porofeseri Buhigiro uko abona agaciro abategetsi baha itegeko nshinga muri Afurika.

Ubushinjacyaha bwavuze ko n’ubwo nta muntu Bucyibaruta yishe n’ukuboko kwe ariko ko amaraso y’Abatutsi barenga ibihumbi 100 muri Gikongoro ari ku mutwe we.
Urubanza ruregwamo Laurent Bucyibaruta wari Perefe wa Gikongoro ruri kubera mu rukiko rwa rubanda rw’i Paris mu Bufaransa.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 8 Nyakanga 2022, ijambo ryihariwe n’Ubushinjacyaha gusa, aho abashinjacyaha Celine VIGUIER na Sophie HAVARD basobanuriraga urukiko rwa rubanda rw’i Paris uburyo Laurent Bucyibaruta yagize uruhare
... (985 chars skipped) ... 
uta babivuze ahubwo ko Jenoside ari ubushake bw’ubutegetsi bwariho bwashyizwe mu bikorwa uko bwakabaye, ubwo butegetsi Bucyibaruta akaba yarabukoreye kugeza buhirimye.
Yongeyeho ko ibyo Bucyibaruta avuga ko nta bushobozi yari afite bwo kugira icyo akora ngo akize abantu, ari ibinyoma, kuko Bucyibaruta yakomeje kuyobora kandi afite ububasha bwose ahabwa nka Perefe.
Yavuze ko byose byatewe n’umuco wo kudahana, aho Bucyibaruta yarebereraga ba Burugumesitiri be bica abantu, ntabihanangirize, ahubwo 
... (985 chars skipped) ...
se no kuri za bariyeri zitandukanye hirya no hino muri Gikongoro.
Yavuze ko ibyo byaha bidasaza, ati: "Ibyo byaha ntibisaza bityo tukaba tumusabira gufungwa burundu. N’ubwo agaragara nk’umuntu ukuze cyane aracyafite ubwenge buzima bityo akaba akwiye guhanirwa ibyo yakoze. Ibyo, muzakore akazi kanyu, ariko Bucyibaruta ntazacike ubutabera ku byaha yakoze".
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa Mbere tariki 11 Nyakanga 2022, Bucyibaruta n’abamwunganira bazahabwa ijambo, mbere y’uko urukiko rutanga umwanzuro warwo.

Tag Archives: Kizito Mihigo
Byanditswe na David Himbara Aho Paul Kagame ntarimo arebera kubyabaye kuri Ethiopia na Eritrea? Ibi bihugu byombi byafunguye inzira y’amasahyaka menshi. Kagame yabeshye abantu ko afunguye inzira y’amashyaka afungura umunyapolitiki Ingabire Victoire gusa abandi abarekera muri gereza Igihugu cya Ethiopia
Nyuma y’ifungurwa rya Ingabire Victoire Umuhoza n’izindi mfungwa za politiki, FLN umutwe w’Ingabo za MRCD, mu itangazo washyize ahagaaragara, ufite icyo utangariza Abanyarwanda bose, ugasaba Paul Kagame gufungura n’izindi mfungwa, gufungura urubuga rwa politiki no kwemera imishyikirano amazi atararenga inkombe.
Kizito Mihigo – Iteme (Le pont – The bridge). Mana yaduhanze ikadupfira, reka tukwibuke twibuka abacu. Reka tuvuge icyiza wavanye mu rupfu, kidutere ukwizera, kitwongerere ukwemera. N’ubwo twashegeshwe n’ibyago by’agahomamunwa, n’ubwo rubanda badukwennye, tuzayatungura. N’ubwo amahanga yavuze ngo tuzi kwicana

Hari tariki ya 12 Ukuboza 2010, ubwo Polisi yo mu gihugu cy’u Buholandi yasakaga bikomeye inzu Ingabire Victoire yabanagamo n’umugabo we Lin Muyizere ndetse n’imodoka bari batunze. Ibi byabyaye ku busabe urwego rw’ubushinjacyaha bw’u Rwanda bwari bwagejeje ku nzego zo mu Buholandi, nuko abapolisi 12 basaka inzu yose yari iherereye Zevenhuizen, hafi n’umugi wa Rotterdam nuko bohereze amadosiye ndetse na mudasobwa mu Rwanda basanzeyo. Umugabo wa Ingabire, Lin Muyizere kuko yari azi ibyo bafashe ya
... (44 chars skipped) ... 
rango batabyohereza mu Rwanda ariko biranga biba iby’ubusa. Polisi kandi yasatse n’inzu yundi muntu wari ukomeye muri FDU Inkingi yari iherereye mu mugi wa Bilthoven. Inyandiko zashinje Ingabire kandi ntizavuye mu Buholandi gusa kuko hari n’izoherejwe n’ubushinjacyaha bwa Leta ya Kongo-Kinshasa.
Amadosiye yoherejwe mu Rwanda, yaje ashimangira ibyo ubushinjacyaha bwanshinjaga Ingabire, cyane cyane ko Ingabire yashinjwaga nabo bakoranaga muri FDLR harimo Col Nditurende na Lt Col Noel Habiyaremye n
... (44 chars skipped) ...
 na Polisi y’u Buholandi, birimo inyandiko mvugo y’inama, impapuro zigaragaza ko yoherereje amafranga FDLR turabibagezaho mu mashusho nkuko byakoreshejwe mu rubanza.
Ingabire Victoire akomeje kwishongora ashaka kugaragaza ko ari umunyapolitiki w’amahoro, ariko nk’abandi banabose bafite ababyeyi bijanditse muri Jenoside, yumvikanye ahakana uruhare rwa nyina umubyara, Dusabe Therese wakatiwe burundu n’inkiko Gacaca kubera uruhare rwe mu kurimbura Abatutsi mu cyahoze ari Butamwa aho yari umuforomo.

Umuherwe Bill Gates n’itsinda rigize umuryango yashinze wa Bill and Milinda Gates Foundation bari muri Ethiopia ahari gutangizwa imishinga y’ubuhinzi, ubworozi.
Muri uru rizunduka Minisitiri w’intebe wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed ari kumwe na Bill Gates basuye umwe mu mirima y’ingano wahinzwe ku bufatanye bwa Leta ya Ethiopia ndetse n’umuryango wa Bill na Melinda Gates.
Minisitiri w’intebe wa Ethiopia abinyujije ku rukuta rwa X yashimiye ubu bufatanye ndetse agaragaza ko uretse mu buhinzi n’ubworozi bwamaze kugera no mu zindi nzego zirimo ubuzima, n’ishoramari.
Minisitiri w’intebe Abiy yatangaje ko ibimaze gukorwa ari ubuhamya bufatika bwemeza ko umubano hagati y’igihugu ayoboye n’umuryango wa Bill na Melinda Gates butajegajega kandi buzakomeza.
Umuherwe Bill Gates wamenyekanye cyane mu ikoranabuhanga ryatumye amara igihe kinini ariwe muherwe wa mbere ku isi, ubu aragenda yimurira ishoramari mu bikorwa bindi bitari ikoranabuhanga nk’ubuhinzi, ubuvuzi ndetse n’ibikorwa by’ubugiraneza binyuze mu muryango wa Bill na Melinda Gates.
Abasesengurira hafi ibi bikorwa bwa Bill Gates muri Afurika ariko bakemeza ko atari ubufasha by’ubugiraneza gusa ahubwo ko hari ubucuruzi bwihishe inyuma kandi birimo inyungu nyinshi.

Hemejwe ko inama y’Inteko rusange ya 73 y’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (FIFA) ya 2023 izatorerwamo Perezida wa FIFA izabera mu Rwanda.
Iyi nteko rusange iteganyijwe tariki ya 16 Werurwe 2023 i Kigali mu Rwanda akaba ari ho hazatorerwa perezida wa FIFA uzayiyobora mu gihe cy’imyaka 4 iri imbere.
Byemejwe nama yahuje abayobozi b’impuzamashyirahamwe z’umupira w’amaguru ku Isi ndetse na Gianni Infantino uyobora FIFA.
Muri iyi nama kandi niho havuye umwanzuro w’uko mu gikombe cy’Isi cya Qatar umubare w’abakinnyi uva kuri 23 ukagera kuri 26.
Gianni Infatino uri mu Rwanda muri CHOGM, aheruka gutangaza ko ubwo manda ye izaba irangiye azongera kwiyamamariza kuyobora FIFA mu yindi myaka 4 iri imbere.
NDEKEZI JOHNSON / UMUSEKE.RW

Amakipe agiye kongera gusiragira kubera Kigali Pele Stadium
Kigali Pele Stadium igiye kongera kuvugururwa
FERWAFA yasabwe kwimura imikino iri hagati y'amatariki: 23-29 Ukwakira 2023
Kigali Pelé Stadium igiye kongera kuvugururwa ndetse bishobora gutuma itakira umukino APR FC izakiramo Rayon Sports ku wa 29 Ukwakira 2023.
Umujyi wa Kigali wandikiye FERWAFA ubamenyesha ko guhera kuwa 23 kugeza kuwa 29 Ukwakira 2023, iyi Stade izongera kuvugururwa bagomba gushaka aho imikino ya Shampiyona izakinirwa harimo n’umukino w’ishyiraniro wa APR FC izakira Rayon Sports.
Umujyi wa Kigali wasabye FERWAFA kwimura imikino yari kuhabera mu cyumweru gitaha.
Iyo mikino irimo:
25.10: RAYON SPORTS vs POLICE FC
27.10: Gorilla vs Marines FC
27.10: Kiyovu vs Etoile
28.10: Gasogi vs Police
29.10: APR FC vs RAYON SPORTS
Icyakora hari amakuru avuga ko umukino wa APR FC na Rayon Sports wo uzabera kuri Kigali Pele Stadium.
Ku wa Gatatu tariki 15 Werurwe 2023,nibwo Stade ya Kigali yongeye gufungurwa nyuma y’iminsi ifunze ndetse inahabwa izina rishya rya Kigali Pele Stadium.
Yafunguwe ku mugaragaro na Perezida w’u Rwanda Paul Kagame ndetse na Perezida wa FIFA, Gianni Infantino.

Mu minsi ishize twababwiye inkuru yuko umunyarwandakazi Yolo The Queen yari yakurikiwe n’icyamamare muri muzika Drake ndetse hanagaragaye bumwe mu butumwa uyu muhanzi yagiye yandikira Yolo The Queen.
Kuri ubu umuhanzi Diamond Platnumz nawe yabengutswe Yolo The Queen akaba yamwongereye ku mubare w’abantu 975 akurikira ku rubuga rwa instagram akamugira uwa 976.
Umuhanzi Diamond Platnumz ari mu bakomeye cyane muri Afurika ndetse no ku ruhando mpuzamahanga. Diamond Platnumz kandi aza mu ba mbere ku isi bafite ibihangano bigira umubare mwinshi w’abafana kuri YouTube.

Dore impamvu nyamukuru abagabo benshi bahitanwa na Coronavirus kurusha abagore
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Yale University muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, bwagaragaje ko imibiri y’abagore ifite amahirwe menshi yo kwiyubakamo abasirikare bahangana na Coronavirus kurusha abagabo.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwatangajwe mu kinyamakuru Nature, buvuga ko abagabo bagize 60 % by’abantu bamaze kwandura Coronavirus ku isi.
Ibyo byateye abashakashatsi gushaka impamvu, baza gusanga uburyo imibiri y’abagore n’ab
... (190 chars skipped) ... 
o abasirikare benshi cyane cyane utunyangingo tw’abasirikare b’umubiri tuzwi nka T lymphocytes, dufasha mu kumenya virusi yinjiye mu mubiri no kuyirwanya. Ibyo ni nako abashakashatsi babisanze no mu bagore bakuze.
Mu bagabo ho, basanze utwo tunyangingo tuba ari duke ugereranyije n’abagore. Iyo bigeze mu basaza ho utwo tunyangingo tuba duke cyane.
Mu mubiri w’abagabo barwaye coronavirus, abashakashatsi basanzemo ubundi buryo bw’ubwirinzi bw’umubiri buzwi nka cytokines, butwika virus idasanzwe yaj
... (190 chars skipped) ...
uka, ibihugu byinshi byagiye bigaragaza ko abagabo ari bamwe mu bahitanwa cyane nayo.
Inzobere mu buvuzi, Dr Sara Kayat yabwiye Aljazeera ko mu byongera umubare w’abagabo bahitanwa na coronavirus , ari uko aribo bakunze kugaragara mu myitwarire ishobora guhsyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga.
Hari izindi nzobere zasabye ko hakorwa ubundi bushakashatsi bwmbitse bugakoreswamo abantu benshi kuko ubwa Yale University bwakorewe ku bantu 98, kandi hakarebwa ku bindi bintu byinshi aho kurebera ku gitsina gusa.

kagaragara we n’imbwa ze.

Umutegetsi wo mu mugambwe utavuga rumwe na Leta UPD Zigamibanga, Léopold Habarugira, yaranyurujwe ku musi wa kabiri itariki 12 Nyakanga 2017. Akaba yanyuryujwe igihe yariko agenda n’amaguru ari kumwe n’umukenyezi wiwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, nkuko umugambwe wiwe n’umuryango wiwe babivuga.
Uyo mukenyezi wiwe yabwiye BBC Afrique ati : « Nariko ngenda n’amaguru ndi kumwe n’umunega wanje igihe imodoka yirabura itagira plaque yahagarara imbere yacu ». Inyuma y’ivyo, haciye hasohoka mw’iyo modoka abantu bane harimwo numwe « yambaye impuzu z’igipolisi afise n’inkoho, maze baca batwara Léopold Habarugira abantu bose babibona.
Léopold Habarugira, afise imyaka 54, ni umunyabigega mu mugambwe UPD Zigamibanga kandi akaba ari umwe muri benshi batavuga rumwe na Leta atari yahunze igihugu. Gushika ubu nta makuru aramenyekana neza uko uyo Léopold Habarugira amerewe.

Abasirikare ba Ukraine bateye intambwe bagera muri kilometero 30 imbere mu Burusiya, mu gitero cya mbere cyinjiye kure cyane mu Burusiya kandi gikomeye cyane kibayeho kuva Uburusiya bwatangira igitero gisesuye kuri Ukraine muri Gashyantare (2) mu 2022.
Minisiteri y’ingabo z’Uburusiya yavuze ko abasirikare babwo barwanye n’abasirikare ba Ukraine hafi y’ibyaro bya Tolpino na Obshchy Kolodez, mu gihe igitero cya Ukraine mu karere ka Kursk cyinjiye mu munsi wa gatandatu.
Umuvugizi wa minisiteri y’ub
... (2116 chars skipped) ... 
o agaragara nk’ayerekana igitero cy’Uburusiya hafi y’icyaro cya Levshinka, kiri mu ntera ya kilometero 25 uvuye ku mupaka.
Abasirikare ba Ukraine bigambye ko bafashe imidugudu myinshi yo mu karere ka Kursk. Mu cyaro cya Guevo, kiri mu ntera ya kilometero hafi 3 imbere mu Burusiya, abasirikare ba Ukraine bifashe amashusho barimo gukuraho ibendera ry’Uburusiya ku nyubako y’ubutegetsi.
Amashusho yanagaragaye yerekana abasirikare ba Ukraine bafata inyubako z’ubutegetsi mu byaro bya Sverdlikovo na Po
... (2116 chars skipped) ...
izo.
Abasesenguzi bamwe bumvikanishije ko iki gitero mu karere ka Kursk kiri mu rwego rwo guhatira Uburusiya kwimurira ingabo ahandi hatari mu burasirazuba bwa Ukraine, no koroshya igitutu ku bwirinzi bwa Ukraine busumberejwe.
Ariko wa mutegetsi wo muri Ukraine yabwiye AFP ko kugeza ubu habayeho ugucogora (amahwemo) gucye mu bikorwa by’Uburusiya mu burasirazuba bwa Ukraine.
Mu cyumweru gishize, Perezida w’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko iki gitero cya Ukraine ari "ubushotoranyi bukomeye".

Polisi y'Igihugu yerekanye abantu 16 bafashwe ahagana saa tanu z'ijoro barenze ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid19, aho bari basuye mugenzi wabo uri mu kato mu rugo nyuma y'uko asanganywe iki cyorezo, 4 muri bo bapimwe basangwa baranduye.
Ubuyobozi bwa polisi buvuga ko biteye impungenge, bugasaba abaturarwanda bose gutanga amakuru igihe babonye abo bakeka ko barenze ku mabwiriza yashyizweho.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi, CP John Bosco Kabera avuga ko abafashwe bagiye gukurikiranwa, agasaba abanyarwanda bose gutanga amakuru igihe babonye abakora ibinyuranyije n'amabwiriza, kandi bakitegura ko isaha n'isaha hashobora gushyirwaho ingamba zikarishye kuruta izari zisanweho.
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2021, ni bwo hatangiye kubahirizwa ingamba ziyongera ku zari zisanzweho nyuma y'uko ubwandu bwa Covid-19 bwihinduranyije buzwi nka Omicron bugeze mu Rwanda.
CP Kabera asaba abanyarwanda
kwitwararika no kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Covid-19 cyane cyane muri iyi minsi
mikuru isoza umwaka, kuko ngo hashobora kuzafatwa ingamba zikarishye nk'uko
byagenze mu mwaka washize.

Umujyanama mu biro bya Amerika yandikiye inteko y'abacamanza ko Bwana Trump adashobora kwitaba icyo gikorwa ngo gikorwa mu buryo "bubogamye". Mu cyumweru gishize, Trump yasabwe n'abagize iyi nteko kuyitaba akisobanura cyangwa akareka gukomeza kwinuba yamagana ibiri gukorwa.

 mu ishyaka ry'abademokarate mu kwiyamamariza kuyobora Amerika, n'umuhungu we Hunter Biden, wakoreye kompanyi y'iby'ingufu muri Ukraine yitwa Burisma.
Iperereza rigamije kureba niba Bwana Trump atarakangishije Ukraine kuyambura ubufasha mu bya gisirikare ihabwa na Amerika niba idakoze ibyo yifuza ku batavuga rumwe na we. Trump ibi bimuhamye bishobora kumuviramo kweguzwa ku mwanya ariho. Trump ariko yahakanye ko nta kibi yakoze kandi yamaganye iki gikorwa kiri gukorwa.

Inyubakwa zose ziri ku nkengera y’ikiyaga Tanganyika zirabangamiwe n’amazi y’ico kiyaga ariko araduga ku muvuduko udasanzwe.
Mu bice bimwe bimwe vyegereye ahitwa Kibenga Rural na Kinindo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura amazi aramaze kurenga imetero amajana atanu aduga.
Umuhinga mu bijanye n’ugutunganya ibisagara hamwe no gukingira ibidukikije Bernard Sindayigaya avuga ko iduga ry’amazi ya Tanganyika atari rishasha ngo kuko ryaheruka kubaho mu 1964.
Bernard Sindayigaya asaba abajejwe gutunganya ibisagara gusubiramwo amategeko agenga kwubaka hafi y’ikiyaga Tanganyika.

U Rwanda rwakiriwe mu Ihuriro ry’Ubucuruzi ku Isi
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Korea yakiriye Sinan Ozturk, umuyobozi w’Ihuriro ry’Ubucuruzi ku Isi (Global Business Alliance, GBA).
Muri iri huriro ni ho hahurizwa ibigo by’ubucuruzi byo muri Korea n’ibindi byo muri Korea bikora ubucuruzi mpuzamahanga.
Binyuze mu butumwa bugufi bwatambutse ku rubuga rwa X rukoreshwa na Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Korea, buvuga ko GBA yakiriye u Rwanda nk’umunyamuryango.
Bugira buti “GBA yahaye ikaze u Rwanda nk’umunyamuryango inasobanura inyungu zo guhuza Sosiyete z’ubucuruzi mu Rwanda na Korea haba mu ishoramari ryo kwinjiza cyangwa kohereza ibicuruzwa”.
Kuva mu 1963 u Rwanda na Korea y’Epfo ni bwo byatangiye kubana nk’ibihugu by’inshuti.
Korea yagiye ifasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye n’uburezi, kubaka ubushobozi mu bakozi, kwigisha imyuga n’ubumenyingiro, guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, guteza imbere ibyaro n’ibindi byinshi bikorwa n’ikigo cyabo cy’iterambere mpuzamahanga (KOICA) gikorera mu Rwanda kuva mu 2006.

Kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 11 Kigarama 2021 , niho Ndayishimiye Warren Chebby umurundi asanzwe aba mu Bwongereza yagendera umugwi wa Gitega Academy, intumbero yo gufata urugendo rumushikana i Gitega ku murwa mukuru wa Poritike akaba kwari ukuyaga n’abo bakinyi bakiri bato kugira bashobore kumutura ibibazo bafise ndetse bashobore no gusangira imfungurwa zo ku murango.

Mwomenya y’uko imigwi ya Gitega Academy ari imigwi ibiri , uw’abakuze ukaba ukina mu cicaro ca gatatu muri Championnat locale hamwe n’uwo abakiri bato.

Minisiteri y’ingabo ya Ethiopia yatangaje igihembo cya miliyoni 10 z’ama-birr akoreshwa muri icyo gihugu (arenga miliyoni 253Frw) ku muntu wese watanga amakuru yatuma abakuru b’umutwe Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) bafatwa.
Leta ya Ethiopia ivuga ko abo bakuru ba TPLF barimo gushakishwa.
Icyo gihembo ku muntu watanga amakuru yatuma bafatwa cyatangajwe kuri uyu wa gatanu na Liyetona Jenerali Asrat Denero.
Yavuze ko kigamije gutuma abo bantu bafatwa byihuse.
Mu kwezi gushize, hasohowe imp
... (113 chars skipped) ... 
 yombi abandi babarirwa mu macumi bakuru cyangwa bahoze ari bakuru mu gisirikare cya Ethiopia.
Mu kwezi gushize, Minisitiri w’intebe wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed yatangaje ko imirwano yarangiye muri Tigray, nyuma yuko ingabo za Ethiopia zifashe umurwa mukuru Mekelle wa Tigray.
Hashize iminsi nta makuru y’abakuru ba TPLF, ariko mbere bari basezeranyije ko bazakomeza kurwana kugeza ingabo za leta ya Ethiopia - bita ababateye - zivuye muri Tigray.

... (113 chars skipped) ...
ri bo ni Keria Ibrahim wahoze ari umukuru w’inteko ishingamategeko ya Tigray, byavuzwe ko yishyikirije abategetsi ba Ethiopia mu byumweru birenga bibiri bishize, ariko ntarongera kugaragara.
Ntabwo kandi bizwi niba hari urukiko yajyanywemo.

Uyu mutwe wagabye igitero mu mujyi w’ubucuruzi wa leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika New York .Ni igitero cy’ubwiyahuzi cyahitanye ubuzima bw’ abarenga 11 abandi bagera kuri 6 barakomereka, bikaba byatumye umutekano ukazwa ndetse n’ikumirwa ku bimukira.
Umutekano wakajijwe mu mujyi wa New York,abimukira barakumirwa.
Kuri uyu wa kabiri, nibwo hasakaye inkuru y’igitero cy’ubwiyahuzi cyakozwe n’umushoferi warutwaye igikamyo ahazwi nk’i Manhattan mu gace kagenewe abanyamaguru ndetse n’abakoresha amagare. Nyuma yo guhitana abantu uyu mushoferi akaba yavuye mu modoka agenda agira ati : “Allah Akhbar” (Imana niyo nkuru).
Gusa kurundi ruhande Perezida wa leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika Donald Trump akaba yamaganye yivuye inyuma iki gitero bikekwa ko cyakozwe na Islamic State ndetse akaba yahise atanga inshingano ku nzego z’umutekano gukaza umutekano imbere mu gihugu ndetse no gukumira abimukira.
Inzego z’umutekano zahise zitabara.
Mu butumwa Perezida Donald Trump yanyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Tweeter yagize ati : “Ntitugomba kwemerera Islamic State kugaruka cyangwa kwinjira mu gihugu cyacu kandi twarayitsindiye mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati n’ahandi. Ibi birahagije.”
Iki gitero kikaba cyibukije Abanyamerika icyabaye nyuma y’imyaka 16 ku nyubako y’ubucuruzi ya One World Trade Center cyasize amashusho atibagirana mu mateka ya leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika.

Umwaka ushize,Polisi y’u Rwanda yafashe imodoka eshanu zacuruzwaga ku buryo butemewe mu Rwanda.Mu kwezi kwa Gashyantare 2015, Polisi y’u Rwanda yahaye iya Kenya imodoka ebyiri zari ziziwe i Nairobi, abazibye bakaba barashakaga kujya kuzigurisha muri Kongo bazinyujije mu Rwanda.
Polisi y’u Rwanda irishimira ubufatanye na za polisi zo ku rwego rw’akarere no ku rwegompuzamahangandetse n’indi miryango,ibi bikaba aribyo nkingi yo kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka birimo n’ubujura bw’imodoka.

Ikipe ya APR FC kuri ubu ifite umutoza mushya ukomoka mu gihugu cya Serbia, yitwa Dr Ljubomir Petrovic akaba yahawe amasezerano y’umwaka umwe.
Mu gusinya amasezerano y’umwaka umwe uyu mutoza yahawe inshingano zo kugeza ikipe mu matsinda mu mikino y’amakipe yabaye aya mbere iwayo ku mugabane w’Afurika (CAF Champion’s League).Akaba asabwa kandi gutwara ibikombe bibiri bikinirwa mu Rwanda byaba shampiyona ndetse n’igikombe cy’Amahoro.
Ubu APR yari ifitwe n’umutoza Mashami Vincent waje asimbuye umudage Andreas Spier wayitozaga akaba yareguye.
Uyu mutoza mushya wa APR Dr Ljubomir afite imyaka 67 akaba amaze imyaka 32 mu kazi k’ubutoza.Uyu mugabo w’inararibonye yatwaye igikombe cy’irushanwa ry’amakipe yabaye aya mbere iwayo ku mugabane w’Uburayi (UEFA Champions League) ubwo yatozaga Red Star Belgrade yo muri Serbia mu mwaka wa 1991.
Uyu mutoza yegukanye shampiyona y’icyiciro cya kabiri muri Yougoslavie ubwo yatozaga Partak Subotica muri 1988, atwara shampiyona 1989 atoza Vojvodana Novi Sad, atwara shampiyona ya Yougoslavie n’igikombe cy’igihugu ari kumwe na Red Star Belgrade.
Petrovic yatoje amakipe atandukanye nka Osijek, Espanyol Barcelona, Spartak Subotica,Yugoslavia U18 ,Yugoslavia U21,Vojvodina,Rad, Red Star Belgrade,Peñarol,PAOK Athene, Shanghai Shenhua,Levski Sofia na Beijing Guoan.
Ikipe ya APR FC iritegura imikino ya Cecafa Kagame Cup izabera mu Rwanda tariki ya 8 Kanama 2014.

Ikipe y’umukino wa volleyball y’Ikigo gishinzwe gukwirakwiza ingufu z’amashanyarazi REG yasinyishije abakinnyi batandatu bazakina mu marushanwa ateganyijwe mu kwezi k’Ugushyingo.
Umutoza mukuru wa REG Volleball Club Jean Paul Mana yatangaje ko iyi kipe yasinyanye amasezerano n’abakinnyi b’abahanga batandatu bazayifasha kwegukana intsinzi mu marushanwa ari imbere.
Yagize ati”Twasinyishije abakinnyi batanu amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri nkuko dushaka kubaka ikipe ikomeye ishobora guhangana n’andi makipe.Ni abakinnyi beza kandi ndizera ko bazatanga umusaruro mu marushanwa ari imbere”.
Andi masezerano REG VC yayagiranye n’uwahoze akinira ikipe y’igihugu ya Volleyball,Pierre Marshal Kwizera nawe wasinye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri.Abakinnyi basinyishijwe bakiniye amakipe atandukanye arimo Gahini Vc,Kibungo Vc,Umubano Blue Tigers,KVC,Rayon sport n’ahandi.
Mu bakinnyi basinye aya masezerano ni Silvestre Ndayisaba wavuye mu ikipe ya Kirehe,Placide Sibomana wavuye muri Qatar,Elvien Ndamukunda wavuye I Gisagara,Simon Rwigema I Rusomo na Martial Inkoramutima.

Perezida wa Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump ntabwo azahura na Kim Jong Un mu kwezi gutaha niko ibiro bya Perezida wa Leta zunze Ubumwe White House byatangajwe kuri uyu wa 24 Gicurasi 2018.
Perezida Trump na Kim Jong un bagombaga guhura tariki 12 Kamena bagahurira muri Singapore.
Mu ibaruwa Perezida Trump yandikiye Perezida Kim yatangajwe na White House kuri uyu wa kane, yagize ati “Ndumva bidakwiye, uyu mwanya, ko tugirana iyi nama. Isi, na Koreya ya ruguru by’umwihariho, bibuze amahirwe akomeye y’amahoro arambye n’uburumbuke. Aya mahirwe abuze ni ikintu kibabaje mu mateka.”
Ibi bitangajwe mu gihe ku wa Kabiri Trump yari yatangajwe ko ashobora kudahura na Kim Jong un mu kwezi gutaha ariko ku munsi ukurikiyeho ku wa Gatatu Umunyamabanga wa Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Mike Pompeo akavugurura Perezida Trump avuga ko iyo gahunda itahindutse, gusa byarangiye mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane ibiro bya Perezida Trump byemeje ko gahunda yo guhura na Kim Jong un perezida wa Koreya ya Ruguru itakibaye mu kwezi gutaha.

Umunyezamu wa Argentine akomeje kuvugisha benshi nyuma yo guhabwa igihembo cye akagifatisha hafi y’imyanya y’ibanga ubwo yacyerekaga abakunzi be
Umunyezamu w’ikipe y’igihugu ya Agentine Emmiliano Martinez yakoze akazi kadasanzwe ubwo yafashaga igihugu cye kwikura mu nzara z’ikipe y’igihugu ya Argentine ndetse uyu mugabo yagenewe igihembo ariko avugisha benshi ubwo yishimiraga iki gihembo ariko yagifatishije hafi y’imyanya y’ibanga.
Uyu munyezamu yagenewe igihembo cy’umunyezamu wahize abandi ndetse yabihamije ubwo yafashaga igihugu cye gutsinda Ubufaransa kuri Penaliti 4-2 bigatuma begukana igikombe cy’Isi.
Uyu munyezamu ubusanzwe arindira ikipe ya Aston Villa mu gihugu cy’Ubwongereza ndetse yahoze afatira ikipe ya Arsenal nyuma iza kumurekura yerekeza mu ikipe ya Aston Villa.
Abasesenguzi batandukanye bakorera BBC bose bahurije kukuvuga ko Martinez yitwaye neza cyane mu mukino batsinzemo Ubufaransa nyuma yo kugaragara abyina mu izamu bigatitiza abakinnyi bamwe na nbamwe kubera ubwoba.

Robertinho yari yabashije kunganyiriza i Kigali na Al Hilal 1-1 mu mukino w’ijonjora ry’ibanze rya Total CAF Champions Leaugue. Umukino wo kwishyura uzakinirwa muri Sudani tariki 25 Kanama 2019. Sisitemu yo gukurikirana umukungugu
Sisitemu igizwe na sisitemu yo gukurikirana ibice, sisitemu yo gukurikirana urusaku, sisitemu yo gukurikirana ikirere, sisitemu yo gukurikirana amashusho, sisitemu yohereza amashanyarazi, sisitemu yo gutanga amashanyarazi, sisitemu yo gutunganya amakuru yibanze hamwe nuburyo bwo gukurikirana amakuru yibicu.Sitasiyo ikurikirana ihuza imirimo itandukanye nko mu kirere PM2.5, PM10 ikurikirana, ubushyuhe bw’ibidukikije, ubushuhe n’umuvuduko w’umuyaga no gukurikirana icyerekezo, gukurikirana urusaku, gukurikirana amashusho no gufata amashusho y’ibyuka bihumanya bikabije (bidakenewe), gukurikirana uburozi kandi bwangiza (( bidashoboka);Ihuriro ryamakuru ni urubuga ruhujwe nububiko bwa interineti, rufite imirimo yo kugenzura buri sub-sitasiyo no gutabaza amakuru, gufata amajwi, kubaza, imibare, raporo yasohotse nibindi bikorwa.

Iyi film ivuga kuri Frank Abagnale (Leonardo DiCaprio) wari umutekamutwe wo mu rwego rwo hejuru: mbere y'uko yuzuza imyaka 19, yari amaze gukina imitwe yamubyariye inyungu zirenga miliyoni 2 z'amadolari. Muri iyi mitwe harimo kuba umupiloti w'imwe mu masosiyete y'indege akomeye yo muri USA, gukora amasheki y'impimbano, kuba muganga (doctor), umushinjacyaha muri parike nkuru, kuba umwarimu muri kaminuza, ari nta na kimwe yigeze yiga.
Iyi film yasohotse muri 2002, bitabuza uwayirebye kongera kuyireba.
Imara iminota 141.
Ivuga inkuru yabayeho, y'umugabo Frank Abagnale, kuri ubu ukora nk'umujyanama mu by'umutekano hariya muri USA.
Irimo abakinnyi b'ibyamamare gusa: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Amy Adams, Martin Sheen, Nathalie Baye

Shandong Qihe Biotechnology Co., Ltd ni umwe mu bakora inganda zikomeye zitegura imbuto-imbuto yihariye y'ibihumyo birimo amoko atandukanye nka shiitake, ibihumyo bya oster, ibihumyo bya king oyster, mane y'intare n'ibindi. Nka societe yo murwego rwohejuru rwikoranabuhanga rwemejwe na ISO22000 na GlobalG.AP, dushyira mubikorwa politiki yubuziranenge ikomeye kugirango tumenye neza. Twaguye kandi amashami yacu hamwe n’imirima y’ibihumyo muri Amerika, Ubuyapani, Koreya yepfo, Polonye, Espagne, Ubudage n’Ubufaransa kuko Qihe Biotech yamamaye kwisi yose.

FC Barcelona : Messi arashobora kuzosiba murukino rwa Inter de Milan ?
Ikinyamakuru L’Equipe ca bafaransa kimenyesha ko uyo munya Argentine ashobora kuzosiba inkino zibiri rwa Getafe na Inter de Milan.
Lionnel Messi kizigenza wa FC Barcelone aherutse gusubirizwa mugice ca mbere na Osmane Dembele murukino Barcelona iherutse gutsinda Villarreal (2-1) biturutse k’umvune. Itangazo rya FC Barcelona rivugako kizigenza wabo afise imvune yo kukuguru kw’ibubamfu ariko muriryo tangazo Barcelone ntiyamenyesheje ikiringo azomara ari hanze y’ikibuga.
Ikinyamakuru L’Equipe ca bafaransa kimenyesha ko uyo munya Argentine ashobora kuzosiba urukino umurwi wiwe uzota mu mitwe na Getafe ku munsi wa gatandatu muri la Liga (16H00), ico kinyamakuru nyeye kibandanya kivugako n’urukino rw’indwi igira kabiri ya Champions League FC Barcelona izotana mu mitwe na Inter de Milan kuri uyu wa kabiri w’indwi iza uyo mukinyi ashobora kutazoboneka muri urwo rukino.
FC Barcelone murukino rwa mbere rwa Champions League ukaba waranganije na Dortmund (0-0) murukino Messi yinjiye atevye.
Ntimutinye kugira ico mushikirije (Commentaires) canke ico mudusaba kumakuru yose tubashikiriza.
0 Nizo ncuro bavuze kuri ino nkuru!
Ivyiyumviro!
Nta muntu aratanga iciyumviro kur'ino nkuru, ni mube aba mbere mutanze iciyumviro canyu kuko buri ciyumviro cubaka kirakenewe iwacu.

Inkuru dukesha Ikinyamakuru Washington Post ariko yanagarutsweho n’ibindi binyamakuru bitandukanye, ni uko abagenzi batatu bari bari muri iyo ndetse n’abapilote babiri bo muri Kompanyi ya ‘Malu Aviation’ baguye muri iyo mpanuka y’indege yari ivuye mu Mujyi wa Goma yerekeza ahitwa Shabunda mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyepfo.
Kashombanya Dieudonné, umuyobozi wa Shabunda yagize ati “Ubu twatangije iperereza ryo kugira ngo hamenyekane impamvu yateye iyo mpanuka. Twifatanyije n’imiryango y’abantu baguye muri iyo mpanuka .”
Ku rubuga rwa ‘Malu Aviation’ bavuga ko indege zabo ubundi zitwara abantu n’imizigo muri ako karere. Impanuka z’indege aho mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo-Kinshaka si ibintu bishya kuko zikunze kubaho, ariko na none abagenzi bahitamo gukomeza gukoresha indege, kuko nibwo baba bizeye umutekano, kurusha gukoresha umuhanda kuko muri ako gace higanje imitwe y’inyeshyamba zitwaza intwaro.

Ikipe ya Patriots BBC ntiyashoboye kwigaranzura ikipe ya City Oilers yo muri Uganda ku mukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cy’imikino y’akarere ka gatanu kuko iyi kipe yari imbere y’abafana bayo yayitsinze amanota 86 kuri 59 ihita inegukana iki gikombe .
Ikipe ya Patriots yarushijwe bikomeye n’abasore b’iyi kipe aho agace ka mbere katangiye City Oilers itsinda amanota atandatu ku busa ndetse kuyifasha kugatsinda ku manota 22 kuri 20 ya Patriots.
Ikipe ya Patriots yakomeje kurushwa mu duce tubiri twakurikiyeho aho yakomeje gusigwa ku kinyuranyo cy’amanota menshi ndetse biza kurangira inatsinzwe umukino wose.
Ikipe ya APR WBBC yari ihagarariye u Rwanda mu bagore ntiyahiriwe n’iri rushanwa kuko yarangije ku mwanya wa 5 mu makipe 7 yari yitabiriye iri rushanwa aho ikipe ya KPA yo muri Kenya ariyo yegukanye igikombe itsinze Equity nayo yo muri Kenya.
Aya makipe City Oilers na KPA niyo azahagararira akarere ka gatanu mu mikino nyafurika izabera i Rades muri Tunisia mu Ukuboza kuva tariki ya 8 kugeza ku ya 17 uyu mwaka.

Umuyobozi mushya i New York
Bill de Blasio yatsinze amatora yu buyobozi bwa karere ka New York.
Bwana de Blasio niwe mudemokarate wa mbere ugiye kuyobora New York mu myaka 20.
Bwana de Blasio asimbuye umukire ukomeye Michael Bloomberg nyuma yo kwiyamamaza avuga ko ashaka kuzakurikirana ikibazo cyu buringanire mu bantu, n'imikorere y'igipolisi avuga ko ikaze.
Ahandi muri Amerika, umudemokarate Terry McAuliffe yatsindiye kuba umuyobozi wa leta ya Virginia.
Naho umurepublicain Chris Christie, benshi bavuga ko ashobora kuziyamamariza kuba perezida mu gihe kirimbere, yongeye gutorerwa kuyobora leta ya New Jersey.
Aya niyo matora mu rwego rwo hejuru yaba kuva perezida Barack Obama yakongera gutorwa umwaka ushize.

Yashakanye na Jeannette Rwigema, amusigira abana babiri, Eric Gisa Rwigema na Teta Gisa Rwigema. Nyuma y’itabaruka rye, yasimbuwe ku buyobozi bw’Ingabo za RPA na Paul Kagame, wari ufite ipeti rya Major, ayobora urugamba kugeza ku ntsinzi yo ku ya 4 Nyakanga 1994 ari nabwo Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi.
Major General Fred Gisa Rwigema, yubashywe nk’imwe mu ntwari zikomeye z’Igihugu, umubiri we uruhukiye mu Irimbi ry’Intwari i Remera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, hafi ya Stade Amahoro.

Polisi y’u Rwanda yateguye igitaramo cyo gukangurira abantu kwirinda impanuka zo mu muhanda, aho umuhanzi Bruce Melody, azataramira abazacyitabira.
Kuva ku cyumweru Polisi irimo gukora ubukangurambaga bwo kwibutsa abantu kwirinda kunywa ibisindisha batwaye ibinyabiziga, iki gitaramo kizabera muri stade ya IPRC Kicukiro, kikaba kiri muri ubu bukangurambaga.
Iki gitaramo kizaba kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 23 Ugushyingo 2018, Saa Munani z’amanywa, kwinjira bikazaba ari ubuntu kuri buri wese.
Abahanzi batandukanye n’abandi bazwi cyane mu myidagaduro mu Rwanda bazaba bari muri iki gitaramo gusa umuhanzi wamaze gutangazwa uzaririmba ni Bruce Melody.
Ku rubuga rwa Polisi y’u Rwanda rwa Twitter banditse bavuga ko ‘Mu rwego rwo gukomeza gushishikariza abantu gusigasira umutekano wo mu muhanda, yateguye igitaramo cyo kubakangurira kugira amakenga bakirinda kunywa inzoga batwaye ibinyabiziga’

Nasibu Abdoul Juma Issak benshi bazi nka Diamond Platnumz uno musi abarizwa ku mugabane wa amerika aho yajanywe n’ukwitabira urubanza rw’itangwa ry’ubushimwe bwa BET Awards, yashize amaboko hejuru aho avuga imodoka ya Rolls Royce ata bushobozi afise bwo kuyigura.
Ivyo akaba yabishikirije muri Commentaire ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Instagram aho yari yashize ahabona ishushe indirimbo yiwe iriko iramenyekanishwa muri Amerika mu gisagara ca New York mu kibanza bita Time Square.
Mu bagize ico bashikiriza kuri iyo Post yakoze, harimwo Manager wiwe Sallam Sk aho yamusaba kugura Rolls Royce areke kuguma ashira kuri Instagram amatangazo gusa. Uwo muririmvyi yahavuye nawe yishura ko bidakunda ko ayigura kuko ata bushobozi bwo kuyigura afise.
Uwo muririmvyi akaba abishikirije mu gihe abatari bake babandanya kuvuga ko Diamond atarakwiye kugura imodoka 2 zisa ziri mu bwoko bwa Cadillac Escalade, ariko ngo yari kugura imodoka imwe yok u rwego ariko, nukuvuga imodoka zasohotse muri uno mwaka wa 2021.
Mwomenya ko izo modoka 2 zije zisanga izindi zitari nke zikomeye nazo zibarizwa muzo Diamond asanzwe agendesha, izo nazo ni nka BMW, Landcruiser V8, n’izindi.

Umutoza Jose Mourinho uhorana udushya yaciye ibintu mu binyamakuru bitandukanye mu Bwongereza kubera ukuntu yiyogosheje umusatsi akawumaraho agasigarana uruhara.
Mourinho yagiye kwiyogoshesha kuri Salon yitwa barbers Haks Oscar arangije ashyira hanze amafoto bituma benshi bavuga ko yiyemeje gushakira hasi hejuru intsinzi cyane ko ngo iyo yiyogoshesheje akubita amakipe kakahava.
Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere Mourinho yikuyeho umusatsi wose ndetse ibinyamakuru bivuga ko iyo abikoze atsinda cyane.
Ubwo yari muri Chelsea mu mwaka w’imikino 2006-07,yariyogoshesheje bituma atsinda imikino 9 muri 11 yakinnye amaze kubikora.
Ubwo yari agarutse muri Chelsea mu mwaka w’imikino 2013-14,yiyogoshesheje umusatsi wose bituma atsinda imikino mu 10 yakinnye.
Tottenham izakina na Aston Villa kuwa 16 Gashyantare aho benshi biteze kureba koko niba kwikuzaho umusatsi wose kwa Mourinho bizamufasha akaza muri Big 4.
Mu mikino 19 Jose Mourinho amaze gutoza Tottenham,yatsinze 10,anganya 4 atsindwa 5.

Inkuru y’akababaro kuva muri Nigeria: Abantu barenga 100 bapfuye barohamye ubwo bari mu nzira bava mu bukwe (icyateye iyi mpanuka nta muntu wagikekaga)
Abantu barenga 100 barohamye naho abandi baburiwe irengero nyuma yuko ubwato bwari bubatwaye bubirindutse mu ruzi rwa Niger mu majyepfo ashyira uburengerazuba bwa Nigeria.
Ubwo bwato bwari butwaye abantu barenga 300 bavaga muri leta ya Kwara bajya muri leta ya Niger (yo mu zigize Nigeria) nyuma yo kwitabira ibirori by’ubukwe.
Abategetsi bavuze ko ibikorwa byo gushakisha no gukora ubutabazi birimo kuba.
Umutegetsi gakondo waho yavuze ko ubwo bwato bwabirindutse nyuma yuko bugonze igiti
Umuvugizi wa polisi muri leta ya Kwara yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru AFP ko umubare w’abapfuye ushobora kwiyongera mu gihe ibikorwa byo gushakisha no gutabara bikomeje.

Jurgen Klopp amaze gutangaza umukinnyi yitezeho kumucungura k’umukino wo kuri uyu mugoroba
Jurgen Klopp Umudage utoza Liverpool yizeye ko Sadio Mane ashobora kuba umucunguzi ukomeye wa Liverpool ku mukino wa nyuma wa Champions League.
Uyu mukinnyi Sadio Mane yerekeje i Paris guhangana na Real Madrid ahagaze neza bikomeye kuko yatsinze ibitego 23 mu mikino 50 yakinnye muri uyu mwaka w’imikino.
Mane w’imyaka 30 arifuzwa cyane na Bayern Munich gusa umutoza we yatangaje ko yizereye mu bushobozi bw’uyu mukinnyi kuri uyu mugoroba
Klopp yizeye ko kwegukana Igikombe cya karindwi cya Champions League kuri Liverpool gishobora kongerera amahirwe Mane cyangwa mugenzi we Mohammed Salah yo gutwara Ballon d’or.

Igisirikare c’u Buhindi cavuze ko umwe mubasoda babo babiri biciwe kumupaka bariko baraganira ivya Pakistani mu ntara ya Kashmir yaciwe umutwe n’abasirikare ba Pakistani. Ngo basanze imivyimba yabo bayiciyemwo ibice.
Kuwa kabiri, u Buhindi bwagirije Pakistani ko yarenganye ku mupaka ikagira ibitero ku butaka bwayo.
Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w’u Buhindi, A.K.Anthony yavuze ko ibikorwa vya Pakistani biriko birabasomborotsa cane.
Pakistani ariko yarahakanye iyo myidogo, ivuga ko ari umugambi wo kubereka ko atarivyo kugira ngo abantu bavyibagire ivy’umusirikare wa Pakistani yishwe mu ndwi iheze.

Mu ntwaro zitandukanye, Ekleziya ishira imbere intwaro rusangi kuko irusha izindi ndinganizo kwubahiriza uburenganzira bwo kugira uruhara mu gutora abarongora abandi, bwo kubasubiriza iyo hageze canke iyo babonye ko bibereye.
Nyenicubahiro Musenyeri Yohakimu Ntahondereye, Umwungere wa Diyoseze Katorika ya Muyinga yarashikirije inyigisho urwaruka rwari mw’ihwaniro ku rwego rwa Diyoseze.Iryo hwaniro ryabereye muri Paruwase yitiriwe Yozefu Mweranda Umukozi kuva kw’igenekerezo rya 11 gushika 14 Myandagaro 2019. Iyo nyigisho yari ishimikiye « Ku nyifato y’Umukristu mu ntwaro rusangi cane cane mu bihe vy’amatora ». Ni inyigisho yafashije cane urwaruka ari naco gituma, igisata ca SAVACOM, cashimye kubasangiza bimwe bimwe mu vyo Umwungere yayagiye urwaruka twizeye ko bitobura uwo vyunganira mu buzima bwiwe bwa misi yose.

Kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 22 Nyakanga, Polisi y’u Rwanda yagaruje moto ebyiri zari zibwe zafatiwe mu bikorwa bitandukanye byakozwe mu turere twa Gasabo na Nyagatare, aho hafashwe abantu batatu bacyekwaho kugira uruhare muri ubwo bujura.
Moto imwe yafatiwe mu Karere ka Gasabo, Umurenge wa Nduba, Akagali ka Gatunga, Umudugudu wa Mataba, indi ifatirwa mu Murenge Rushaki mu Karere ka Gicumbi, ikaba yari yibiwe mu Karere ka Nyagatare, mu Murenge wa Kiyombe, Akagali ka Kabungo, Umudugudu wa Cyondo.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba Superintendent of Police (SP) HamdunTwizeyimana, yihanangirije abantu bafite ingeso yo kwiba kubireka kuko Polisi y’u Rwanda iri maso, yiteguye kubafata bakagezwa imbere y’ubutabera

Ikipe y’igihugu ya Mexique na Pologne zatengushye abakunzi bazo zigwa miswi nubwo Lewandowski yateye amahirwe inyoni
Ikipe y’igihugu ya Mexico yanganyije 0-0 n’ikipe y’igihugu ya Poland aho Robert Lewandowski yahushije igitego nyuma yo kunanirwa gutsinda penaliti.
Uyu mukino waranzwe no huhangana ku makipe yombi nubwo bwose ikipe y’igihugu ya Poland yahushije amahirwe yabonye ubwo Robert Lewandowski yahushaga aya mahirwe.
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku ruhande rwa Mexico: Ochoa; Sánchez, Montes, Héctor Moreno, Gallardo; Héctor Herrera, Edson Álvarez, Chávez; Lozano, Henry Martin na Vega
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku ruhande rwa Poland:Szczesny; Bereszynski, Glik, Kiwior, Cash; Kaminski, Krychowiak, S.Szymanski, Zielinski, Zalewski na Lewandowski
ikipe y’igihugu ya Mexico ni imwe mu makipe afite umunyezamu ukuze aho afite imyaka 40 y’amavuko ndetse yanabashije gupangurura Penaliti yari atewe bituma ikipe ye ibasha kwihagararaho.

Abanyamakuru ba siporo mu Rwanda bihimuye ku mutoza w'Ikipe z'Ingabo z'Igihugu,Adil Mohamed wari umaze igihe abakoroga abima ikiganiro.
Nyuma yo gutsindwa na Kiyovu Sports ibitego 2-1 mu mukino w'umunsi wa 27 wa shampiyona,Adil Mohamed yinjiye aho yari agiye mu kiganiro n'Itangazamakuru,aba banyamakuru bamusaba "gusohoka".
Ubwo yinjiraga aho aba banyamakuru bari bateraniye,bahise barangururira icyarimwe bati "Sortez,Sortez!!!"bivuga ngo sohoka,sohoka!!.
Ubwo aba banyamakuru bamaganaga uyu mutoza bamusaba gusohoka,yahise yibwiriza arasohoka arigendera batavuganye nawe.
Uyu mutoza yari yatangaje ko nta kindi kiganiro azongera kugirana n'abanyamakuru mbere y'uko aza muri iki.
Ibi aba banyamakuru babikoze kubera ko ku mukino uheruka APR FC yanganyije na Rayon Sports igitego 0-0 mu mukino ubanza wa 1/2 cy'igikombe cy'Amahoro, yanze kubaha ikiganiro.
Adil Mohamed amaze iminsi yibasira abanyamakuru batandukanye bo ku binyamakuru byo mu Rwanda ahereye kuri Radio &TV10,akurikizaho abo kuri Flash FM hanyuma asoreza kuwo kuri RBA.
Adil Mohamed yaherukaga kandi gushwana n'umutoza wa Rayon Sports nyuma y'umukino wabahuje biba ngombwa ko abakinnyi n'abatoza babungirije batabara.

mafaranga bidatinze.

Ibaye inama ya gatatu y'ihuriro ry'ibihugu bifite ubukungu bwa mbere, Major Economies Forum (MEF) mu Cyongereza. Inama ya mbere yatumijwe n'uwari perezida wa Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika mu 2009, Barack Obama.
Mu bari mu nama y'uyu munsi twavugamo Misiri (izakira inama itaha ya ONU ku mihindukire y'ibihe mu kwa 11 gutaha). Perezidanse y'Amerika, Maison Blanche, yatangaje ko Perezida Biden na mugenzi we wa Misiri, Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, baza kumurika umugambi wo gufasha Afrika kurwanya imihindukire y'ibihe.
Ibihugu bya MEF byihariye 80% by'ubukungu bwose bw'isi. Ni byo rero byohereza ibyuka byonona ikirere. Inama y'uyu munsi irateganya guca inzira ihamye yo kubigabanya ku buryo bizaba byashize bitarenze umwaka w'2030.
Usibye ibihugu bibiri bya mbere bihumanya ikirere kurusha ibindi, ari byo Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika n'Ubushinwa, inama irimo kandi Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa, Ubudage, Arabiya Sawudite, Arijantina, Ostraliya, Chili, Canada, Indonesiya, Ubuyapani, Mexique, Norvege, Koreya y'Epfo, Turkiya, Emira z'Abarabu, Vietnam, Misiri, na Nijeriya, umunyamabanga mukuru w'Umuryango w'Abibumbye, n'Umuryango w'ubumwe bw'Uburayi.
Facebook Forum

Umukino wa AS Kigali FC na APR FC ni wo wari uwa nyuma kuri Hakizimana Louis wari umusifuzi mpuzamahanga.
Hakizimana Ambroise we yahagaritse gusifura mbere ya mugenzi we (Louis) ariko kuri uyu munsi nibwo byashyizwe ku mugaragaro.
Aba basifuzi bombi, bagaragarijwe urukundo na barumuna babo bakiri mu mwuga wo gusifura, baza bambaye imipira yanditseho ngo “Mwarakoze”.
Biteganyijwe ko Hakizimana Louis azasimburwa na Rulisa Patience, mu gihe Hakizimana Ambroise we yasimbuwe na Mugabo Eric.
Aba bombi basifuye amarushanwa mpuzamahanga akomeye, arimo amarushanwa y’amakipe yabaye aya Mbere iwayo muri Afurika, CAF Champions League n’amarushanwa y’amakipe yegukanye ibikombe iwayo, CAF Confederation Cup.
Basifuye kandi amarushanwa ahuza amakipe ahatanira kujya mu mikino Olempike. Hakizimana Louis we yanasifuye igikombe cya Afurika cy’abakuru n’icy’abari munsi y’imyaka 20 (Africa U-20 Cup Of Nations).
Hakizimana Louis yasifuye amarushanwa arimo Igikombe cya Afurika cy’abari munsi y’imyaka 20 mu 2017, mu 2018 yasifuye igikombe cya Afurika cy’abakina imbere mu gihugu [CHAN] muri Maroc n’igikombe cya Afurika cyabereye mu Misiri mu 2019.
Aba bombi mu myaka irenga icumi bari bamaze ari abasifuzi mpuzamahanga, basifuye imikino ikomeye mu Rwanda irimo ihuza APR FC na Rayon Sports FC n’ihuza Kiyovu Sports na Rayon Sports cyangwa na APR FC.

Mu gihe mu mwaka uza wa 2024 ariho hari hategekanijwe ishirwa mu ngiro ry’umugambi wo gukoresha ifaranga rimwe mu bihugu bigize umuryango wa Afrika y’ubuseruko, Iryo sango ryahavuye ryigizwa inyuma rishirwa mu mwaka wa 2031. Ivyo bikaba biri muvyapfunditswe mu nama y’abarongoye amabanki makuru y’ibihugu bigize umuryango wa Afrika y’ubuseruko yabereye mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mw’iy’indwi turiko tusozera.
Kuba isango yo mu 2024 yo gushira mu ngiro umugambi wo gukoresha ifaranga rimwe muri EAC yigizwa inyuma , Abo barongoye ayo mabanki yo muri EAC baranga imvo zabitumye. Ubwa mbere n’uko ibihugu bigize umuryango wa Afrika y’ubuseruko vyari vyapfunditse ko bigabanya ibihengeri vy’amafaranga bikoresha kugeza ku rugero rw’ibice 3 kw’ijana, yamara ngo nta gihugu na kimwe cabishitseko.
Iyindi mvo yabitumye akaba ari uko iduga ry’ibiciro bivurwa kovyavuye ku kiza ca Covid-19 hamwe no ku ntambara ihuza uburusiya na Ukraine.
Mw’iyo nama, Hakaba kandi hateweko umukono ku masezerano ajanye n’uko abanyagihugu bo muri EAC bagiye kuzoza bakoresha amafaranga y’ibihugu vyabo iyo batembereye muri kimwe mu gihugu kigize uwo muryango.
