Mu bakobwa 37 bahatanira ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2021, Akanama Nkemurampaka karatora abakobwa 18 bonyine bakomeza kuko 2 bagize amajwi menshi bamaze kubona 'PASS' yo kwerekeza muri 20 bari butsinde bakajya mu mwiherero.
Kabagema aratuje cyane
Imitima ya benshi iri kudiha bibaza niba bakomeza, ntawanga intsinzi ni uko yayibura. Abakobwa bose bari kwiyerekana bivuga amazina babazwa n'ibibazo bitandukanye. Ikiri bugenderweho mu gutanga amanota, ni uburyo bagaragara, intambuko, imivugire no kwigirira icyizere mu gusubiza ibyo babazwa.
Mu gihe abakobwa 35 bose bari kubaza imitima yabo niba batsinda, Kabagema Laila uhagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali we aratuje kuko ayoboye abandi mu majwi aho afite 207,021(SMS) na 33,353 (Online), agakurikirwa na Ishimwe Sonia uhagarariye Uburengerazuba n'amajwi 177,844 na 31,000 (Online).
Uyu mukobwa ntakibazo afite kuko afite amajwi menshi

Mu cyegeranyo cyakozwe n'urubuga rwa Skytrax gisanzwe gitegura ibyegeranyo bigaragaza uko ibibuga by'indege bikurikirana, cyagaragaje uburyo ibibuga by'indege bikurikirana mu bwiza aho kibanda ku mugabane wa Afurika.
Kuri iyi nshuro, uru rubuga rwongeye kugaragaza ibibuga by'indege byiza 10 muri Afurika. Ni urutonde rwiganjemo ibibuga by'indege byo muri Afrika y'Epfo (South Africa). Ikibuga cy'indege mpuzamahanga cya Kigali, mu Rwanda, cyaje ku mwanya wa 8, ariko si ubwa mbere kibonetse mu bibuga by'indege 10 byiza muri Afrika.

Umuriro wo gushaka gukuraho VAR mu gihugu cy’uBwongereza, umaze iminsi waka mu makipe atandukanye, abafana, abayobozi b’amakipe, abakinnyi, ndetse n’abandi benshi bakurikirana ibya ruhago muri kiriya gihugu.
Iyi nambara yatangiye nyuma yuko bigaragaye ko VAR iri kwifashishwa mu kwiba cyangwa kubera amakipe amwe na mwe muri iyi shampiona.
Gusa bamwe n’ibabyemera ko ikibazo ari VAR ahubwo bavuga ko ikibazo ari abasifuzi batazi ibyo bakora. Bati “ikibazo si VAR ahubwo ni abasifuzi batazi icyo bakora, niyo mpamvu mbona ko ducyeneye abasifuzi bo muri Africa ngo babe aribo baza gusifura inaha”. Ayo ni amagambo y’umutoza wa Brighton , Roberto De Zerbi.
Ibi siwe gusa ubibona gutya kuko benshi bagaragaza ko muri Africa hari abasifuzi benshi babahanga kandi barusha abasifura muri Premier League, yewe bazi no gukoresha VAR kubarusha.

Umutoza wa APR FC witwa Adil Mohammed Erradi,uhembwa akayabo k’ibihumbi 18 by’amadolari ku kwezi,yamaze kugurirwa imodoka nshya ya SUZUKI Vitara yo mu bwoko buheruka gukorwa ifite imiryango 5.
Adil ukorera Frw 600 000 buri munsi,yaguriwe imodoka yo gukoresha mu kazi ke ka buri munsi ifite agaciro kari hagati y’amadolari y’Amerika 21 000 na 35 000 utabariyemo imisoro.
Nubwo iyi modoka itaragera mu Rwanda,amakuru dukesha ikinyamakuru Funclub nuko uyu mugabo yamaze kugurirwa iyi modoka ihenze cyane.
Umutoza Adil Mohamed Erradi ukomoka muri Maroc,yatoje mu Bubiligi mu makipe y’abato, akora muri Maroc mu ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru,aba umutoza wungirije mu ikipe ya Raja Casablanca.Yatoje kandi ikipe ya Bechem United yo muri Ghana mbere yo kuza mu Rwanda.
None kwitaragera mu Rwanda iriya foto mwayikuyehe

Igisirikare ca Israeli cavuze ko cagavye ibitero ku birindiro vy’igisirikare co mu kirere ca Syria no ku bibanza vya Irani inyuma yaho inteko za Syria zivugiye ko zakoroye indege y’ingwano ya Israeli.
Iyo ndege yaguye ku butaka bwa Israeli; abadereva bayo babiri barakomereka — umwe muri bo akaba aremvye.
Igisirikare ca Israeli cerekanye video yo mu kibanza c’abadereva, yerekana « drone » idafise umudereva ya Irani irashwe munyuma igwa hasi.
Syria n’abacuti bayo ba Irani barahakana ko iyo « drone » yinjiye ku butaka bwa Israeli.

Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu byatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Gatanu Perezida Kagame aza kwakira Tshisekedi ku mupaka wa La Corniche. Bombi baraza gusura Umujyi wa Rubavu bareba ingaruka z’iruka ry’ikirunga cya Nyiragongo.

Amakuru dukesha urubuga rw’iradiyo y’abongereza BBC, amenyesha ko ico gihugu c’Ubushinwa ,kivuga ko kitazorera amaboko uburenganzira n’inyungu zaco bihungabanijwe.
Iryo gabisha ry’umushikiranganji w’Ubushinwa ajejwe ubudandaji rishitse hasigaye amasaha make, umukuru w’igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump ,atangaze ayandi makori ku bidandazwa vy’Ubushinwa vyinjira muri Amerika.
Ubutegetsi bw’Ubushinwa busubiramwo ingingo yasohowe ku munsi wa gatatu n’ikigo kigenzura ubudandaji mpuzamakungu "World Trade Organisation" kivuga ko Amerika itashize ibikenewe vyose mu ngiro ku vyo yasabwe mu mwaka wa 2014, vyo kudashira amakori ku bidandazwa bimwe bimwe vy’Ubushinwa.
Ibigo bitandukanye vy’ubudandaji vyasavye umukuru w’igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, kwisubirako kuri ico ciyumviro co gushira amakori mashasha ku Bushinwa, basigura ko vyozana ingaruka mbi ku miryango.
Amakuru avuga ko,Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziteguye gushinga amakori y’amahera azoshika ku miriyardi 60 z’amadorare y’abanyamerika,ku bidandazwa vy’Ubushinwa.

– Ufise Yesu Kristo mu bugingo bwiwe nk´umwami n´umukiza wiwe vy´ukuri ntakikekeranyeko, ugashikama mu kwizera udatinya ikintu na kimwe, ubuzima bwawe bugenda butabagwa kandi bwaguka ku mpande zose no muri vyose. Amen.

Imirwano ikomeye i Sirte muri Libya
I Sirte muri Libya hariko harabera imirwano ikomeye mu gihe abasirikare bakuye Khaddafi ku butegetsi bagihanganye n'abamushigikiye.
Naho bazungurutswe, abashigikiye Khaddafi banse gushira ibirwanisho hasi.
Umunyamakuru wa BBC ari Sirte avuga ko abarwanya Khaddafi ubu bariko barakoresha ibisasu biremereye ngo babomore amazu, imwe kuri imwe.
Uwo munyamakuru avuga ko arabiye aho yari ahagaze, umuji wa Sirte uboneka ko usigaye ari ibibomeke gusa.
Ishirahamwe ry'abivunira umwansi hamwe, OTAN, rivuga yuko indege zaryo ziriko zirazungura ikirere ca Sirte mu gihe imirwano ibandanya.

... (140 chars skipped) ...

... (140 chars skipped) ...
resha izi mbuga ko kutamenya itegeko bitaribuza guhana uwahuye naryo.

Hari abakwirakwiza ibirimo ibyaha bavuga ko bagamije gucuruza bakinjiriza mu mibare ihanitse y’abareba ibyo bakwirakwije, hakaba n’ababikwirakwiza bagamije gusabanya gusa.

Ikipe ya Barcelona yo mu gihugu cya Espagne imaze kwemeza ko yasinyishije umufaransa Antoine Griezman wakiniraga ikipe ya Athletico Madrid, nyuma yo kumutangaho akayabo ka miliyoni 120 z’amayelo
Iyi kipe y’I Catalunya yemeje aya makuru ibicishije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo. Antoine Griezman w’imyaka 28 y’amavuko, yasinyanye na FC Barcelona amasezerano azageza taliki ya 30/6/2024 anemeranya nayo ko indi kipe yamwifuza aya masezerano atarangiye izishyura miliyone 800 z’amayelo kugira ngo ibashe kuhamuvana.
Ibi bibaye nyuma yaho hari hamaze iminsi bihwihwiswa ko nubundi ashobora kuzayerekezamo, ibi byari byatangiye guhera mu mpeshyi y’umwaka ushize, gusa byaje gusa nkaho bicogoye ubwo Griezman yitangarije ko atazava muri Athletico Madrid.
Antoine Griezman wari umaze imyaka itanu muri iyi kipe ya Athletico Madrid yagezemomu mwaka w’imikino wa 2014 avuye muri Real Sociedad.
Yari amaze kuyitsindira ibitego 133 mu mikino 257 mu marushanwa yose yabashije gukinira iyi kipe.
Asanze muri FC Barcelona abakinnyi b’ibihangange nka Luis Suarez, Lionel Messi, biranavugwa ko mu minsi mike na Neymar Junior ashobora kuba ahasesekaye

I Kigali hatangiye inama nyafurika ku ikoranabuhanga izwi ku izina rya Transform Africa
by Views
ADVERTISEMENT
I Kigali hatangiye inama nyafurika ku ikoranabuhanga izwi ku izina rya Transform Africa, kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 14 Gicurasi 2019.
Atangiza ihuriro ku bukungu muri iyi nama, Minisitiri w'intebe Dr. Edouard NGIRENTE yagaraje ko kuba umugabane wa Africa ufite umubare munini w'urubyiruko, ari amahirwe ku iterambere ry'urwego rw'ikoranabuhanga n'ubukungu bw'umugabane muri rusange.
ADVERTISEMENT
Minisitiri w'intebe yagaragaje mu myaka 10 ishize, urubyiruko rwa Africa rumaze kwiyongeraho miliyoni 140, kandi ko mbere y'umwaka wa 2030 Africa izaba ifite miliyari y'urubyiruko ruri munsi y'imyaka 25.
Yavuze ko ikoranabuhanga ari igisubizo ku kibazo cy'ubushomeri n'ubukungu, asaba abitabiriye iyi nama gutanga ibitekerezo ku buryo ikoranabuhanga muri Africa ryarusha gutera imbere.
Ihuriro ku bukungu ribera mu nama ya Transform Africa niryo ribimburiye ayandi azakurikiraho, harimo ihuriro ry'abayobozi n'iry'abagore.
Ibiganiro bibera muri iyi nama ya Transform Africa ibaye ku nshuro ya 5, biribanda ku iterambere ry'ubukungu bushingiye ku ikoranabuhanga ku mugabane wa Africa.

CECAFA U 17| Intamba mu rugamba zaraye zitsinzwe na Tanzania
Kuri uyu wa gatandatu waraye uheze igenekerezo rya 11 Myandagaro umwaka 2018, niho ihiganwa rya CECAFA U 17 ryaraye ritanguye icese mu gihugu ca Tanzania, mu gisagara ca Dar es Salam ku kibuga ca National Stadium.
Intamba mu rugamba za batarenza imyaka 17 zaraye zitsinzwe urukino rwa mbere n’umugwi w’igihugu ca Tanzania cakiriye iryo higanwa Serengeti boys ibitsindo 2-1.
Tanzania niyo yatanguye kwinjiza igitsindo ca mbere Ku munota wa 10 ibicishe kuri Kevin John , Intamba mu rugamba irakigombora ibicishishije kuri kizigenza wabo Ku munota wa 19. Ku munota wa 26 Agir Ngonda atsindira Tanzania igitsindo ca kabiri, gushika Ku munota wa 90 urukino rurangira Serengeti boys itsinze Intamba mu rugamba ibitsindo 2-1.
Intamba mu rugamba zikaba zizosubira gukina urukino rwa kabiri n’umugwi w’igihugu c’urwanda kuri uyu wa mbere .
Mukamenya y’uko umugwi uzotwara ico gikombe niwo uzoronka uburenganzira bwo guserukira ibihugu biri muri kano karere mu gikombe ca Africa CAN U 17 kizoba mu gihugu ca Tanzania umwaka wa 2019.

Prezida wa Peru yahatswe gukurwa ku butegetsi azira igiturire
Mu matora yabaye mu nama nshingamateka asabwe n'abatavuga rumwe na reta, prezida wa Peru, Pedro Pablo Kuczynski yahatswe gukurwa ku butegetsi yagirizwa igiturire.
Abatavuga rumwe na we bavuga ko adakwiye kuba muri ico kibanza kubera yoba yarakiriye igiturire c'ishirahamwe rimwe ry'ubwubatsi ryo muri Brezil, Odebrecht.
Inyuma y'impari ndende zamaze amasaha arenga cumi n'atatu, Kuczynski yarusimvye ku majwi umunani gusa.
Mu bintu bitangaje, abashingamateka benshi batavuga rumwe na reta nta co babivuzeko, mu ri rusangi abashingamateka 21 bakaba bashimye kutagira ico babivugako.
Ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, Prezida wa Peru yavuze ko ikingi kiringo gishasha co gusubiza hamwe gishobora kuba gitanguye muri ico gihugu.

Yaciye aboneraho akaryo k’ugushira ahabona igitabu ciwe
Mw’ihayanishwa ryari ryateguwe kubera mu gisagara ca Moscou mu Burusiya, Uburundi bwaragize amahirwe mu kuronka agashimwe kitiriwe umunyafrika nyawe ”prix du meilleur africain”.
Impuzu abarundi bahora bambara kera, ingoma, ikinyobwa c’indimano hamwe n’ibindi bikoresho vyerekana akaranga k’Uburundi nivyo vyashoboye kwerekanwa muri iryo hayanishwa, aho abari baryitavye vyabahimbaye cane bamwe bagenda babitwaye amasanamu, abandi bakipfuza kwifatisha amasanamu bari kumwe n’abarundi bariko berekana ivyo bikoresho ndangakaranga vy’iwacu eka hakaba n’abipfuza ko bogenda babijanye mu mihana yabo.
Abari bateguye iryo hayanishwa bakaba bashikirije ako gashimwe umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa mu bushikiranganji bw’ubudandaji n’amahinguriro, Samson NDAYIZEYE, ari nawe yari yagiye aserukiye abarundi bitavye iryo hayanishwa.
Mu guhimbaza iyo ntsinzi Uburundi bwari burose, umuserukizi wabwo mu Burusiya, ambassadeur Edouard BIZIMANA, yaciye aboneraho gutegura ibirori vy’ukwiginana, aho abigeme b’abarundikazi basanzwe baba muri ico gihugu babiciye biracika mu kwerekana imvyino hamwe n’intambo z’ikirundi, eka vyari ibintu biteye igomwe.
Ambassadeur Edouard BIZIMANA akaba yaciye aboneraho akaryo k’ugushira ku mugaragaro igitabu yaheruka kwandika kijanye n’ivyese bivuga ku karanga k’Uburundi n’abarundi.

Nyuma yo gutoroka gereza akajya hanze y’igihugu, umunyamakuru Ntamuhanga Cassien (wafunganywe n’umuririmbyi w’icyamamare Kizito Mihigo), yahaye ijwi rya Amerika ikiganiro yemeza ko we n’abo bari bafunganywe barengana, kuko baciriwe urubanza rutagira ibimenyetso, byose biturutse ku bitekerezo aba bagabo batangaga mu umuryango nyarwanda.
Cassien Ntamuhanga yavuze ko hari ibiganiro yakoreshaga kuri Radio Amazing Grace hamwe n’inshuti ye Niyomugabo Gérard (waburiwe irengero kugeza n’ubu). Ibyo biganiro ngo Leta ntiyabikunze bityo ishaka uko yabikiza.
Ku ruhande rw’umuhanzi Kizito Mihigo ngo mu kiganiro “Umusanzu w’umuhanzi” yayoboraga kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, nawe yatumiye kenshi uyu Niyomugabo Gérard nabo ngo batanga ibitekerezo bitashimishije Leta.
Kizito Mihigo ariko ngo yaje kurushaho gutera umujinya Leta ya Kigali ubwo yahimbaga indirimbo ye “Igisobanuro cy’urupfu” avuga ko yibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, ariko akibuka n’abishwe n’inkotanyi.
Nyuma y’ibyo aba bagabo barafunzwe Kizito Mihigo akatirwa imyaka 10, Ntamuhanga akatirwa 25, naho mugenzi wabo Jean-Paul Dukuzumuremyi we akatirwa imyaka 30.
Ubu bagiye kumara imyaka ine muri gereza, nyamara urubanza rwabo ntirurarangira kuko ubujurire bwabo ntibwigeze buburanishwa.
Umusomyi wa The Rwandan

Nyuma y’ igihe kinini bivugwa ko haba hari bamwe mu bakozi bakorera ikompanyi icukura amabuye y’ agaciro mu murenge wa Rwinkwavu, Polisi y’ igihugu yataye muri yombi umugabo wakoreraga Wolfram Mining nyuma yo kumukekaho kwiba ibiro umunani by’ amabuye ya gasegereti.
Uyu mugabo wanatangajwe amazina akaba ngo asanzwe ari umwe mu bakozi bakorera kompanyi ya Wolfram Mining ikorera imirimo y’ ubucukuzi bw’ amabuye y’ agaciro mu karere ka Kayonza. Aya mabuye yafatanywe uyu mugabo ngo yagiye ayiba mu bihe bitandukanye biza kumenyekana bivuzwe na bamwe mu bo bakoranaga bamuketse.
Nk’ uko twabibwiwe na bamwe mu bo bakoranaga ku Nkondo, uwafashwe akaba afungiye kuri station ya polisi ya Rwinkwavu mu karere ka Kayonza nyuma yo gusanga aya mabuye mu nzu ye mu kagari ka Murama umurenge wa Muarama mu rukerera ahagana saa munani za mu gicuku.
Ntiturashobora kuvugana na DPC wa Kayonza ibi byabereyemo ngo atubwire byinshi ku ifatwa n’ ifungwa ry’ uyu mugabo ukekwaho kwiba gasegereti.

Twemera TT, L / C, Western Union nibindi
Igihe gisanzwe cyo gutanga muminsi 3-5 y'akazi, umurongo wuzuye wo gukora cyangwa ibikoresho binini birashobora gufata igihe kirekire.Gutanga neza bigomba kwemezwa mugihe washyizeho itegeko.
Twatsinze ISO9001, icyemezo cya CCC hamwe na CE.
MOQ yacu kumashini nimwe yashizweho na MOQ kuri moteri ya vibrator ni seti 2. Ibisobanuro nyamuneka twandikire neza.
Twoherejwe mu bihugu n'uturere birenga 60 ku isi.Nk'uko Amerika, Kanada n'ibindi muri Amerika y'Amajyaruguru, Burezili, Mexico n'ibindi muri Amerika y'Epfo.Australiya muri Oceania. Tayilande, Maleziya, Indoneziya, Singapore, Koreya y'Epfo, Arabiya Sawudite, Uburusiya nibindi muri Aziya. Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa, Espagne nibindi muburayi. Afrika yepfo nibindi muri Afrika.
Ihangane oya, Twagiye dusunika imbere.
Ibikoresho bifite garanti yamezi 12, birashobora kongerwa amezi 24 nkuko ubisabwa.

Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika ubu zatambutse Ubutaliyani mu kugira umubare wa mbere munini ku isi w’abamaze kwicwa n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Imibare mishya yatangajwe na Kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins yo muri Amerika igaragaza ko abantu barenga 20,000 imaze kubica muri icyo gihugu.
Inkuru dukesha BBC ivuga ko uyu muhigo mubi Amerika iwuciye nyuma gato yaho iki gihugu kibaye n’icya mbere ku isi kirengeje abantu 2,000 coronavirus yishe mu munsi umwe.

Kugeza ejo ku wa gatandatu nyuma ya saa sita kandi, Ubutaliyani bwari bumaze gutangaza abantu 19,468 bamaze kwicwa na coronavirus muri icyo gihugu bose hamwe.
Mu gihe Amerika yo yari igeze ku bantu 20,506 bamaze kwicwa na coronavirus bose hamwe, nkuko imibare ya Kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins ibigaragaza.
Abantu barenga 100,000 ku isi bamaze kwicwa na coronavirus kuva yakwaduka mu Bushinwa mu kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri k’umwaka ushize, naho abarenga 400,000 bamaze kuyikira.

Abagabo bane bo mu ntara ya Kirundo, baraciriwe gupfungwa imyaka indwi no gutanga ihadabu y’umuriyoni n’igice umwe umwe,na sentare nkuru y’igihugu ya Kirundo, kur’uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 2 Ruheshi 2018.
Abo bagabo ni NDIKUMAGENGE Richard, NTAZIMANA Jean Claude, IGIRANEZA Fiston na NIYONZIMA Vital, bose bo mu ntara ya Kirundo.
Amakuru dukesha umuvugizi wa sentare ntahinyuzwa Agnes BANGIRICENGE, amenyesha ko, abo bagabo baciriwe ico gihano, ku caha co gutunga ibirwanisho bicira umuriro batabifitiye uburenganzira.
Mwomenya ko urwo rubanza rwabaye urw’ikibiriraho.

Uyu munsi mu Rwanda hongeye kwitaba Imana abantu babiri bazize icyorezo cya Coronavirus bakaba bose babarizwaga mu mujyi wa Kigali, Ni mugihe habonetse abarwayi bashya banduye 9 icyorezo cya Coronavirus hakaba hakize abantu 30 umunsi umwe.
Ni mugihe mu bipimo bishya byafashwe 1 400 byagaragaje ko 9 aribo banduye COVID-19 gusa Minisante ikavuga ko bavuye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ndetse no mu Karere ka Nyamagabe na Nyagatare.
Itangazo riragira riti’’Kigali:5, Nyagatare:2, Nyamagabe:2’’

INKURU BIJYANYE Y’URUPFU W’UMWANA WA MUSHIKI W’UMUHANZI THE BEN WAHITANYWE NA COVID-19 MU RWANDA

Igihugu ca Mali kizogirisha amatora, kw’italiki mirongo ibiri n’umunani z’ukwezi kw’indwi, mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko kigerageza kuva mu ruhagarara rwa politike rubandanya.
Ayo matora, azoba abaye aya mbere kuva abasirikare batembagaje prezida Amadou Toumani Toure, mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu mwaka w’2012, yatumye abarwanyi b’Aba Islamu bafashe uburaruko bw’igihugu.
Inteko ziyobowe n’Ubufransa, zaratujije abo barwanyi b’Aba Islamu, mu bice bari bafashe, yamara Reta y’igihugu ca Mali ihanganye n’ibibazo bitari bike, mu gihe amatora yimirije kuba.
Ingwano mu buraruko bw’igihugu, yakuye mu vyabo Abanya Mali ibihumbi amajana n’amajana, aba Tuareg bashaka kwiyonkora kuri Mali, bakaba bafise igisagara gikomeye ca Kidal, mu buraruko bw’igihugu ca Mali.
Ishami ry’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu O-N-U ryitaho impunzi, HCR ryatangaje, ejo ku musi wa kabiri, ko rizoshigikira utwigoro tw’ukwandika abazotora, mu makambi y’impunzi z’Abanya Mali, mu bihugu vya Burkina Faso, Niger, Mauritaniya na Algeria.
Umutegetsi w’igihugu ca Mali, muri iki gihe, Dioncounda Traore, yatangaje ko haba we, canke abandi bagize Reta abaribo bose, kw’ata numwe muribo azokwitoza, mu matora yimirije kuba muri Mali.
